programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The undisputed heavyweight king of kickboxing will be decided in the main event as long reigning champion Rico Verhoeven (60-10, 20 KO) goes up against arguably his most dangerous opponent to date in interim-heavyweight champ Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (25-2-1, 13 KO). Middleweight champ Donovan Wisse (19-1, 10 KO) puts his title on the line against number one contender Michael Boapeah (16-3-1, 7 KO). Wisse has looked unstoppable so far during his title run but now he faces an in-form Michael Boapeah who holds a win over the only man to beat Wisse. The welterweight division sees top ranked stars go head-to-head as Hamicha (40-2, 30 KO) takes on Diaguely Camara (24-4-1, 10 KO) and Jay Overmeer...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Endy Semeleer (35-1, 17 KO) will put his GLORY welterweight title on the line against ‘House of GLORY’ winner Anwar Ouled-Chaib (3-0) in the main event. In the co-main event, local fan favourite Nabil Khachab (26-4-1, 4 KO) finally gets his opportunity to enter the GLORY Grand Prix as he goes up against Serbia’s Nikola Filipovic (11-2, 6 KO) in a qualifying fight. Number one ranked Enriko Kehl (52-15-2, 30 KO) will be aiming undeniably book his spot as the next title challenger against champion Tyjani Beztati. The German meets the dangerous Arman Hambaryan (58-8-2, 27 KO) of Armenia.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E01 GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix 2024
programme.desc: 3 wins to come out on top, whos it going to be? Rico Verhoeven, Levi Rigters, Tarik Osaro, Benjamin Adegbuyi, Sofian Laidouni, Uku Jurjendal, Bahram Rajabzadeh, and Nabil Khachab pair up and throw down for the GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix, an 8-man 1-night heavyweight tournament for the ages.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The GLORY welterweight title will be on the line in the main event as the reigning and defending champion Endy Semeleer (35-1, 17 KO) welcomes the challenge of top contender Chico Kwasi (42-5, 22 KO). In the co-main event, after his crazy GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix performance, the wild and exciting Bahram Rajabzadeh (66-2, 58 KO) steps down to light heavyweight and meets the hard-hitting Paris-based Kevin Oumar (33-4, 7 KO), a French kickboxing champion and budding MMA star. Belgian-Moroccan superstar Youssef Boughanem (187-43-8, 119 KO) steps into the GLORY ring for the very first time in his illustrious career as he meets the Ukraine’s Stanislav Kazantsev (25-8-1, 7 KO). The best of French...

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: The country has become a popular holiday destination for tourists from the UK, and it also has plenty to offer when it comes to carp fishing as well.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: Ali Hamidi is joined by friends Tom Dove and Neil Spooner as they embark upon a quest to northern Africa in pursuit of the big carp which they have heard about.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: Carp fishing definitely isnt something that you would immediately associate with a country that is better known for its stunning beaches, fragrant food and full moon parties.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: Every year thousands of British carp anglers travel across the English Channel with their mates to partake in a carp fishing holiday.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: The Balkans have made a remarkable recovery considering how recently they were a war-torn part of the world, and now attract large numbers of tourists each year.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: The Extremadura region was where the Romans first introduced carp to Spain, and this rugged area now has a reputation for producing some massive ones from the huge lakes.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: Croatia has emerged as probably the best place in the world to go and catch a huge carp and will soon be producing fish in excess of 100lb, likely to break the World record.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: The intrepid trio travel to Slovenia, a country none of them have ever been to before, to fish two very different waters.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: Hungary is home to some of the biggest king carp, including the current world record, and has produced several fish over the magical 100lb mark.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: In the land of windmills, tulips and of course vast networks of canals and other waterways, carp are plentiful, but finding some big ones isnt quite such an easy task.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: In a first for Monster Carp, and as a result of the Covid-19 travel restrictions, Ali, Neil and Tom stay at home in the UK, but that doesnt prevent them from going in search of some very large carp.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: Kicks off at a lake called Carces, as Ali, Tom and Neil embark on a Tour of France around the country in search of some of the huge carp that it is famous for.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: A visit to a complex of lakes, near Reims, which is fished by hundreds of anglers from the UK each year and is one of the most popular holiday venues in the country - Crete Lakes.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: A picturesque lake in the middle of forest land, a couple of hours drive from Paris, which is known as Iles3 and is home to some very special common carp.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: Graviers Lake once held the world record for carp and is still home to some huge fish today, so it made sense that the final leg paid this famous water, near Dijon, a visit.

programme.title: A Few Bullets More
programme.desc: Billy starts as an innocent outlaw protecting his mother but soon becomes a ruthless killer. When love gives him hope for change, Pat Garrett, a fatherly friend, helps him try to turn his life around. Yet fate drags Billy back into violence, and Garrett is ultimately credited with his death.

programme.title: The Ballad of a Gunfighter
programme.desc: An outlaw and his partner feud over the same woman.

programme.title: Cattle Queen of Montana
programme.desc: Sierra Nevada Jones must fight a villainous rancher to regain the land that is rightfully hers.

programme.title: Silver Lode
programme.desc: In Silver Lode, Dan Ballard is arrested by 4 Marshals for murder and theft but he denies the charges and searches for the real culprit even as the townsfolk start abandoning him.

programme.title: Mackenzies Raiders EP33-35
programme.desc: Colonel Mackenzie, commander of the 4th Cavalry Regiment at Fort Clark near Brackettville in Kinney County in southwest Texas during the 1870s, receives secret orders from President Ulysses S. Grant and Secretary of War William W. Belknap to stop bandits from crossing the Rio Grande into the United States, or from returning to Mexico.

programme.title: The White, the Yellow, and the Black
programme.desc: In the 19th century, when the Japanese Emperor sends a gift pony to the US President it gets stolen and ransomed by Indians but Sheriff Gideon aided by an inept Japanese servant offers to deliver the ransom.

programme.title: Damned Pistols of Dallas
programme.desc: Outlaw Fast Draw (Álvarez) assaults stagecoach with passengers Clay Stone (Beir), singer Katy Dior (Marandi) and gambler Fred Foster (Mathot), but Stone is ready to take revenge.

programme.title: Payment in Blood
programme.desc: In 1867 Texas, after the Civil War, Colonel Thomas Blake and his men refuse to surrender, raiding Yankee towns. Rumors swirl that Blake kills for pleasure, not the Confederacy, leading to large bounties for his capture. However, Blake seeks $200,000 that vanished during the war from Confederate coffers. He sends Chamaco Gonzales to track down the missing fortune, hidden in General Beauregards strong box.

programme.title: Silent Thunder
programme.desc: With the help of two bank robbers, a US Marshal sets out to rescue five prostitutes who have been abducted by a gang of desert dwelling, otherworldly, monsters

programme.title: The Counterfeit Kid
programme.desc: Jack, a simple farmhand must get help from a group of wild misfits and find treasure before the outlaw hes been impersonating finds him.

programme.title: Dead Men Dont Count
programme.desc: Two gunmen ride into a town with a plan to collect a large unearned bounty but are caught up in the local war for land caused by the impending arrival of the railroad.

programme.title: Theres a Noose Waiting for You Trinity!
programme.desc: Trinity is an ex-gunslinger desperately wanting to be forgiven and accepted by his family that he abandoned years earlier. Unfortunately for him, a ruthless bounty hunter is on his trail.

programme.title: Madron
programme.desc: A nun, the only survivor of an Indian massacre of a wagon train, is taken in by a cantankerous old gunfighter.

programme.title: Daniel Boone, Trail Blazer
programme.desc: Daniel Boone leads settlers to Kentucky, but must fight Shawnee Indians who have been convinced by a French renegade that Boone and the settlers are there to kill them and steal their land.

programme.title: Taste of Killing
programme.desc: Dubious Bounty Killer Hank Fellows tracks bank stage coaches to observe them being robbed.

programme.title: And Now... Make Your Peace with God
programme.desc: Two men ride toward Denver City, each chasing a ghost from the past—one seeks his father’s killer, the other a treacherous friend who stole his gold. Along the way, a silent, deadly gunslinger joins them, his motives unknown. In the shadows of vengeance, alliances shift and secrets unravel.

programme.title: Mackenzies Raiders EP29-32
programme.desc: Colonel Mackenzie, commander of the 4th Cavalry Regiment at Fort Clark near Brackettville in Kinney County in southwest Texas during the 1870s, receives secret orders from President Ulysses S. Grant and Secretary of War William W. Belknap to stop bandits from crossing the Rio Grande into the United States, or from returning to Mexico.

programme.title: Yellowneck
programme.desc: A disgraced Confederate colonel deserts and escapes into the Everglades, joining four other Southern deserters. Surrounded by hostile Seminoles, the group must navigate the treacherous swamp while confronting both nature and their inner demons in a tense fight for survival.

programme.title: More Dead Than Alive
programme.desc: Released from prison after 18 years, notorious gunslinger Killer Cain is a peaceful reformed man but the Old West has died and he cannot adapt to the modern West where some unpaid moral debts and old troubles resurface.

programme.title: War Paint
programme.desc: Lieut. Billings and his patrol must deliver a peace treaty to Chief Gray Cloud in nine days to prevent war. Guided by the chief’s son, Taslik, they face dwindling water and rising tensions. As suspicions grow, they notice Taslik wearing war paint. Is he leading them to peace or into a trap?

programme.title: The Black Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Two black bounty hunters arrive in a small western town on the trail of an outlaw. Finding the town without a sheriff, they take charge, much to the displeasure of the mostly white townsfolk. As they chase women, demand money, and stir up trouble, they wait for the right moment to capture their prey, raising tensions along the way.

programme.title: Hellgate
programme.desc: Accused of spying for the Confederacy, a man is sent to the brutal Hellgate Prison. After a failed escape lands him in solitary confinement, his path to redemption begins. When a deadly plague strikes the prison, he faces the ultimate test of character, transforming his dire circumstances into a chance for renewal.

programme.title: Joshua The Black Rider
programme.desc: A black soldier returns from fighting for the Union in the Civil War only to find out that his mother has been murdered by a gang of white thugs.

programme.title: My Name is Pecos
programme.desc: Everyone wants to know who the Mexican is. He always answer slowly, "my name is Pecos". Pecos Martinez to be exact, and hes returned to his hometown of Houston to settle up with Clain, the leader of a gang of cut-throats. Clain is busy looking for the money from a recent robbery thats been stolen from him. Soon the stolen cash in Pecos vengeance entwine and all hell breaks loose. Behind the scenes a Bible touting Undertaker (Umberto Raho), a cowardly saloon owner, and a helpful saloon girl become part of the story. This film made Woods as internationally known as Pecos in the third world countries as Franco Nero was known for Django. A Mexican hero against a gang and a town full of...

programme.title: Death on High Mountain
programme.desc: A major robbery spirals out of control when two young men cross paths with ruthless Mexican bandits and a corrupt businessman—both desperate to reclaim the stolen loot. Caught in a deadly chase, the youths face danger, betrayal, and the fight for survival.

programme.title: Buckaroo: The Winchester Does Not Forgive
programme.desc: The Winchester Does Not Forgive - When the stagecoach in which they travel is attacked by Monteiros gang, Lash accepts to kill his friend to save his bacon.

programme.title: Rimfire
programme.desc: Captain Tom Harvey, an undercover army agent, investigates stolen army gold shipments. Posing as a deputy sheriff, he is drawn into solving the mystery of a ghost haunting the town. The ghost is believed to be the spirit of a gambler wrongly hanged for the thefts. Harveys investigation leads him to uncover a dark truth behind the ghostly terror.

programme.title: Watch Out Gringo! Sabata Will Return
programme.desc: A gang of bandits, led by the infamous Luke Morgan, hijacks a stagecoach carrying an army gold strongbox and takes a hostage. But when Carrancho steals the gold from them, hiding it in a grave, the chase intensifies. Both sides race to recover the treasure, with lives at stake and a relentless pursuit in the wild.

programme.title: The Great Jesse James Raid
programme.desc: Retired outlaw Jesse James, under an alias, reluctantly joins Bob Ford for a Colorado gold raid. Assembling a crew, including a demolition expert and a getaway driver, they meet at Fords saloon. Betrayals and bloodshed follow, with Ford plotting against Jesse for a reward. The drama peaks as lives are lost and the two ride off in separate directions.

programme.title: Lightning Jack
programme.desc: Lightning Jack Kane is an Australian outlaw in the wild west. During a bungled bank robbery he picks up mute Ben Doyle as a hostage. The two become good friends, with Jack teaching Ben how to rob banks, while they plan Jacks last heist.

programme.title: Pray to God and Dig Your Grave
programme.desc: Fernando returns from exile in Texas seeking revenge for his siblings deaths. But instead of personal vengeance, he’s driven to spark a revolution against the oppressive landowners, transforming his mission into a fight for justice and freedom.

programme.title: Shotgun
programme.desc: Deputy U.S. Marshal Clay Hardin plans to retire and take a commissioner role, but when the notorious Ben Thompson kills a fellow marshal, Clay abandons his new path—and his girl—to hunt the gang. Joined by a bounty hunter and a captivating half-breed woman, he ventures into Apache land, uncovering a deadly plot to arm the tribes with repeating rifles.

programme.title: Maddie and Kikis BBQ Barn
programme.desc: Fun-loving sisters and expert grillmasters Maddie and Kiki welcome you into their country barn for craveable eats and spicy jokes! On this episode, they smoke some craveable ribs, whip up a hearty salad, and grill Jamaican jerk wings!

programme.desc: Campanias beautiful coastline is filled with two things: tourists and seafood. programme.title: Bonacinis Italy
programme.desc: Chef Michael Bonacini delves into the Italian region of Emilia- Romagna to discover its iconic cuisine. To start, Michael stays light with an airy Mortadella Mousse spread on fluffy Modena Mini Flatbreads. Next, Michael cooks up Tortellini in Broth, a dish originally from Bologna that can be easily altered to personal taste. Michael chooses to fill his tortellini with a rich and savoury mixture of prosciutto, mortadella, and ground pork. For his secondo, Michael uses traditional ingredients and pairs them in a tart, luxurious dish of Duck Breast with Balsamic Cherry Sauce. To wind down his meal, Michael whips up a creamy classic, Rice Custard Cake topped with a Cherry Glaze.

programme.title: Bonacinis Italy
programme.desc: Chef Michael Bonacini explores sweet and spicy dishes hailing from the coastal region of Calabria. For his antipasto, Michael cooks up a light and refreshing Brioche with Gelato. Fluffy brioche buns surround the sweet flavours of gelato for a delicious start to your meal. Switching to spice for the primo, Michael introduces a Spicy Sausage and Ricotta Pasta. Full of sweet, savoury, and spicy flavours, this dish provides a strong, flavourful meal sure to please any crowd. For his secondo, Michael goes for a hearty Lamb au Gratin with Peas and Asparagus; a classic holiday dish that will warm any room. For his finale, Michael whips up a simple, yet impressive, Chocolate-covered Figs.

programme.title: Bonacinis Italy
programme.desc: Full of luxurious treats, the northern Italian region of Lombardy offers rich and delicious cuisine. For his antipasto, celebrity chef Michael Bonacini prepares a delicate dish of Stuffed Squash Blossoms. Soft and light, these blossoms are enhanced with a creamy filling of parmesan, anchovies, and nutmeg. Following the fresh taste of flowers, Michael cooks up an impressive and rich Risotto Milanese. A feast for your eyes and taste buds, this risotto is coloured by saffron and its floral strands release flavour and colour as its cooked. programme.title: Generation Cooks
programme.desc: Aspiring kid Chefs prep rainbow fruit skewers, Liam whips up his charity-inspired cheeseburger soup, while Jae-Anthony and his father Wendell make a popular Trinidadian street food, fried bread and saltfish!

programme.title: Army of One
programme.desc: Matrix 4, Spartacus ja NCIS: New Orleansistakin tuttu Ellen Hollman elamansa roolissa henkihieveriin piestyna naisena, jonka kosto on armoton ja perinpohjainen. Nuori pariskunta lahtee telttailemaan Alabaman metsiin, mutta romanttinen irtiotto arjesta menee kammottavalla tavalla pieleen, kun he tormaavat vakivaltaiseen huumekartelliin. Kartellin miehet tappavat Brennerin aviomiehen Dillonin (Matt Passmore) ja jattavat Brennerin kuolemaan - tai ainakin luulivat jattavansa. Kaikkensa menettanyt Brenner lahtee kostoretkelle, jota kukaan ei osannut odottaa ja jolta yksikaan ei voi valttya. Rajahtavaa toimintaa, joka intensiteetillaan naulitsee katsojan penkkiin jo alkumetreilta!

programme.title: Puhdistaja (Walking Tall)
programme.desc: Kun on kyse lain noudattamisesta, yksi mies voi tehda eron! Toimintatahti Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson ei ota vankeja taistellessaan oikeuden puolesta ja murskatessaan korruptiota tassa tarinassa miehesta, joka ottaa kantaa… ja ottaa kaupunkinsa takaisin!

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: Tulevaisuudessa, jossa aika on kirjaimellisesti rahaa ja ikaantyminen pysahtyy 25 vuoteen, ainoa tapa pysya hengissa on ansaita, varastaa tai peria enemman aikaa. Will Salas elaa minuutti kerrallaan, kunnes yllatysvoitto aikaa antaa hanelle paasyn varakkaiden maailmaan, jossa han ryhtyy yhteistyohon kauniin nuoren perijattaren kanssa tuhotakseen korruptoituneen jarjestelman.

programme.title: Kauas pilvet karkaavat
programme.desc: Kauas pilvet karkaavat kertoo helsinkilaispariskunnasta. Raitiovaununkuljettaja ja perinteikkaan ravintola Dubrovnikin hovimestari menettavat tyonsa, mutta eivat toivoaan Aki Kaurismaen (Le Havre) Suomi-trilogian ensimmaisessa osassa.

programme.title: Seeking a Friend for the End of the World
programme.desc: Valtava asteroidi lahestyy Maata, ja viimeinen keino sen pysayttamiseksi on juuri epaonnistunut. Ihmiset reagoivat 21 paivan paasta koittavaan maailmanloppuun varsin kirjavilla teoilla. Vakuutusmyyja Dodgen ja naapurintytto Pennyn tiet kohtaavat mellakoiden yltyessa ja he paattavat auttaa toisiaan matkalla kohti viimeisia paamaariaan.

programme.title: 10 Items or Less
programme.desc: Oscar ja Golden Globe palkittu Morgan Freeman esittaa elokuvatahtea, joka suunnittelee valkokankaalle paluuta neljan vuoden poissaolon jalkeen. Harkitessaan roolia supermarketin paallikkona, han kay pienessa latino-marketissa Los Angelesin laitamilla. Siella han tapaa kipakan kassaneidin, Scarletin (Paz Vega, Spanglish – kaannoskukkasia, Puhu hanelle). Huomatessaan olevansa kaukana kotoaan, ilman puhelinta taikka ajoneuvoa, elokuvatahti hyvaksyy Scarletin tarjouksen kyydista takaisin ”sivilisaatioon”. Matkan varrella tama ulkoisesti niin erilainen pari loytaa yhteisen savelen, joka pysyvasti muuttaa heidan suhtautumistaan elamaan.

programme.title: Im Not There
programme.desc: MIES. MUSIIKKI. LEGENDA. Nae Heath Ledgerin ja muiden tahtien loistavat roolisuoritukset. Im Not There on epatavallinen matka halki Bob Dylanin elaman. Kuusi eri nayttelijaa esittaa Dylania eri aikakausilla ja eri rooleissa julkisuuden henkilosta yksityiseen. Lopputuloksena on varikas muotokuva tasta julkisuutta karttelevasta amerikkalaisikonista. Runoilija, profeetta, lainsuojaton, teeskentelija, valovoimainen tahti, rocknroll -marttyyri, uskovainen - seitseman identiteettia, yksi elama, yhta lavea ja hurja kuin ajanjakso, jonka moottori se oli.

Kirjailija luuli kirjoittavansa tulevaisuudesta, mutta kirjoittikin menneisyydesta. Hanen romaanissaan juna ajaa silloin talloin vuoteen 2046. Jokaisella matkustajalla oli sama aikomus: elaa kadotetut muistonsa uudestaan. Sanottiin, etta vuonna 2046 mikaan ei ollut muuttunut. Kukaan ei tarkkaan tiennyt, oliko se totta, koska matkustajat eivat koskaan palanneet - paitsi yksi. Han oli siella mutta halusi lahtea pois.

programme.title: A Little Bit Of Heaven
programme.desc: Kate Hudson on taydellinen roolissaan sateilevan kauniina Marleyna, nuorena uranaisena, joka sairastuu yllattaen syopaan. Marley on oikea flirttailija, joka ei ole koskaan ollut rakastunut, mutta kun laakarin roolissa on vastustamaton Gael García Bernal, olisiko rakkaus kuitenkin laakkeista paras?

programme.title: Alvin Ja Pikkuoravat
programme.desc: Usean sukupolven ajan fanit ympari maailman hurmanneilla pikkuoravilla on paljon laulettavaa elokuvadebyytissaan – hulvattoman hauskassa seikkailussa taynna mukaansatempaavaa musiikkia ja porroista porraamista! Kun uransa kanssa ponnisteleva lauluntekija Dave Seville ottaa hoteisiinsa lahjakkaan pikkuoravakolmikon, Alvinin, Simon ja Teron, heista tulee yhdessa yossa musiikillinen sensaatio. !

programme.title: A Late Quartet
programme.desc: Kun maailmankuulun jousikvartetin rakastettu sellisti saa kuulla laakariltaan mullistavan diagnoosin, on koko ryhman tulevaisuus vaakalaudalla. Tukahdutetut tunteet, kilpailevat egot ja hallitsemattomat intohimot uhkaavat suistaa vuosien ystavyyden ja yhteistyon raiteiltaan. Valmistautuessaan 25. vuosipaivan juhlakonserttiinsa, joka saattaa hyvinkin jaada myos viimeiseksi, on toivo heidan maineensa sailymisesta kiinni yhteisista siteista ja musiikin voimasta. Beethovenin Jousikvartetto nro 14 cis-molli opus 131:n ymparille rakennettu A LATE QUARTET on koskettava kunnianosoitus kamarimusiikille ja New Yorkin kulttuurimaailmalle.

programme.title: Lost Highway
programme.desc: Fred Madison ja hanen vaimonsa Renee loytavat salaperaisia videokasetteja kotinsa portailta, ja videoille on kuvattu heidan kotiaan. Ensimmaisessa ulkoa, toisessa sisalta. Poliisi ei ole kiinnostunut auttamaan pariskuntaa, mutta kolmannen videokasetin sisalto passittaa Fredin vankilaan. Ja taman jalkeen mikaan ei ole yhtaan vahemman painajaismaista. Lost Highway on David Lynchin neonoir-trilleri, jonka paaosissa ovat Bill Pullman (Independence Day – Maailmojen sota) ja Oscar-palkittu Patricia Arquette (Boyhood).

programme.title: This is England
programme.desc: Elokuva sijoittuu 1980-luvun Englantiin, jossa Falklandin sotaan lahetetaan jatkuvasti lisaa sotilaita ja kansallismieliset saavat jalansijaa tyovaenluokkaisten tyottomien keskuudessa. Skan ja Oi-punkin kannattajat jakautuvat musiikin ystaviin ja skineihin. Taman kaiken keskella 12-vuotias Shaun loytaa skinijengin kanssa yhteisen savelen.

programme.title: Legacy of lies
programme.desc: Kovaotteinen ovimies Martin Baxter tienaa lisatuloja osallistumalla laillisuuden rajamailla pyoriviin taistelulajikisoihin. Takana on ura MI6:n agenttina, jonka han jatti Kiovassa sattuneen katastrofin takia. Mutta menneisyydellahan on taipumusta loytya edesta hanen ammatissaan. Kun Baxter saa tilaisuuden selvittaa, mita Kiovassa tuona kohtalokkaana iltana tapahtui, han tarttuu siihen.

programme.title: Love and Other Drugs
programme.desc: Vapaamielinen Maggie (Anne Hathaway) kohtaa Viagraa kauppaavan Jamien (Jake Gyllenhaal). Heidan kemiansa petihommissa toimii, joten he paattavat aloittaa suhteen – ilman sitoumuksia. Mutta Maggien ja Jamien ottaa valtaansa huumeista vaarallisin – rakkaus!

programme.title: Alvin Ja Pikkuoravat
programme.desc: Usean sukupolven ajan fanit ympari maailman hurmanneilla pikkuoravilla on paljon laulettavaa elokuvadebyytissaan – hulvattoman hauskassa seikkailussa taynna mukaansatempaavaa musiikkia ja porroista porraamista! Kun uransa kanssa ponnisteleva lauluntekija Dave Seville ottaa hoteisiinsa lahjakkaan pikkuoravakolmikon, Alvinin, Simon ja Teron, heista tulee yhdessa yossa musiikillinen sensaatio. !

Kirjailija luuli kirjoittavansa tulevaisuudesta, mutta kirjoittikin menneisyydesta. Hanen romaanissaan juna ajaa silloin talloin vuoteen 2046. Kukaan ei tarkkaan tiennyt, oliko se totta, koska matkustajat eivat koskaan palanneet - paitsi yksi. Han oli siella mutta halusi lahtea pois.

programme.title: The Big Short
programme.desc: Kun nelja ulkopuolista naki sen, minka isot pankit, media ja valtionhallinto kielsivat - maailmantalouden romahtamisen - he saivat ajatuksen isosta shorttauksesta. Rohkea sijoittaminen johtaa heidat pankkialan pimealle puolelle, jossa kaikki on kyseenalaistettava. Adam Mckayn (Anchorman, Step Brothers) ohjaama elokuva perustuu tositarinaan ja Michael Lewisin menestyskirjaan (The Blind Side, Moneyball). Elokuvaa tahdittavat Christian Bale, Steve Carell, Ryan Gosling ja Brad Pitt.

programme.title: Conviction
programme.desc: Bettyn veli tuomitaan murhasta, jolloin alkaa 18 vuoden taistelu jarjestelmaa vastaan. Betty uskoo veljensa syyttomyyteen, joten han alkaa opiskella oikeustiedetta voidakseen puolustaa veljeaan oikeudessa!

programme.title: Death At A Funeral
programme.desc: Danielin ja Robertin isan kuolema saattaa toraisan perheen yhteen suremaan vainajaa. Kun hautajaisiin ilmestyva mies uhkaa paljastaa vainajan jarkyttavan salaisuuden ellei saa rahaa, on veljesten keksittava jotain paastakseen kiristajasta eroon. Seremoniasta sukeutuu taysi kaaos, kun he yrittavat estaa uutisen kantautumisen saattovaen korviin.

programme.title: Tulitikkutehtaan tytto
programme.desc: Äitinsa ja isapuolensa kanssa asuva ja tulitikkutehtaan liukuhihnalla tyoskenteleva Iiris (Kati Outinen, Mies vailla menneisyytta ja Le Havre) erehtyy luulemaan tanssiravintolassa kohtaamansa miehen kanssa viettamaansa yota rakkaudeksi. Vaarinkasityksella on kohtalokkaat seuraukset.

programme.title: Vieraampi kuin fiktio
programme.desc: Verohallinnon tarkastaja huomaa yhtakkia olevansa vain hanen kuulemansa kerronnan kohteena: kertomus, joka alkaa vaikuttaa hanen koko elamaansa; hanen tyostaan; hanen rakkautensa; hanen kuolemaansa.

programme.title: Fight Club
programme.desc: Jack (Edward Norton) karsii unettomuudesta ja yrittaa paeta tylsaa elamaansa. Han tapaa karismaattisen Tyler Durdenin (Brad Pitt), joka uskoo itsetuhoon elaman suolana, ja yhdessa he perustavat salaisen tappelukerhon, Fight Clubin, jonka suosio on valtava.

programme.title: Childs Play (2019)
programme.desc: ”SE”-elokuvan tuottajien CHILD’S PLAY on taysin uusi versio pahasta Chucky-nukesta kertovasta kauhuklassikosta. Chuckyn aanena kuullaan Mark Hamill. Kun Karen ostaa huippukehittyneen Buddi-nuken syntymapaivalahjaksi pojalleen Andylle, han kutsuu tietamattaan pahuuden kotiinsa. Andyn taytyy saada aikuiset kuuntelemaan, jotta nukke saadaan pysaytettya ennen kuin on liian myohaista.

programme.title: Keinottelua
programme.desc: Menestyvan liikemiehen Robert Millerin (Gere) taydelliselta vaikuttava elama ajautuu syoksykierteeseen yhden kohtalokkaan erehdyksen seurauksena. Miller loytaa itsensa tasapainoilemasta perhe-elaman, yrityskauppojen, uhkaavan kavallussyytteen ja syrjahypyn ristipaineessa. Saatuaan viela sinnikkaan poliisietsiva Michael Bryerin (Roth) peraansa, joutuu Miller epatoivoiseen kujanjuoksuun yrittaessaan korjata tekemansa virheet ennen kuplan puhkeamista.

programme.title: The Birdcage - Lainahoyhenissa
programme.desc: Tassa hysteerisessa komediassa Armand ja Albert ovat rakentaneet taydellisen elaman hoitaessaan Miami-yokerhoaan. Mutta heidan pastellinsa rauha jarkkyy, kun Armandin poika ilmoittaa menevansa naimisiin ultra-konservatiivisen senaattori Keeleyn tyttaren kanssa... ja he kaikki kokoontuvat illalliselle! Pystyvatko Armand ja Albert muuttumaan Herra ja Rouva Perhearvoiksi ajoissa?

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey decides to get Buffalo involved in a D-Day paratrooper jump to commemorate the 70th anniversary of D-Day.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalos top guns, rookies and vets, go to California for aerial dogfights in real fighter planes. Cory and Mikey race to get ready for the D-Day jump.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie co-pilot Scott faces his worst nightmare when a faltering Curtiss C-46 Commando engine and low fog force a scary landing.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Christmas is just around the corner, but Buffalos crucial food and mail runs come to a halt.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A string of bad luck turns chief pilot Arnies 66th birthday run into the flight from hell - and threatens to spoil his naughty birthday surprise.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mechanic Cory races against the clock to turn two short-haul waterbombers into transatlantic aircraft for the epic journey to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A charter flight falls through the cracks after the McBryans attend a wild family wedding, and an irate Joe pulls captain Justin from the Turkey test flights to do the job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A furious Joe fights against a federal suspension that will prevent him from carrying passengers for the first time in 20 years.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: AJ and Candace get married in the Ice Castle. A frustrated Chuck tries to get the Electra to pay her way. A flummoxed Mikey tries to bake a cake for Joes birthday.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Turkey crew makes the critical jump over the North Atlantic. But en route to Portugal, one crew is forced to turn back.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After thousands of hours of painstaking preparation and dangerous flying, a terrible accident devastates the waterbomber crew in Turkey - and everyone at Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When her husband quits after a blowout with Joe, Kelly is put in a terrible position. Will she stay at Buffalo - or will she go?

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey head off to Coventry, England to navigate the potential purchase of an Electra turboprop to add to Buffalos fleet of fire-fighting tanker planes.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After her husbands acrimonious departure from Buffalo, Kelly has a confrontation that decides whether she, too, will quit.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: As Joe fights a Transport Canada claim against the airline, star pilot Justin is tasked with shipping an 8,000lb generator to a remote town.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The curse of -40 hits Buffalo pilots Devan and Scott on a food mail flight up the Mackenzie Valley when a mysterious rise in oil pressure threatens to destroy one of the C-46s engines.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey goes on a treasure hunt to Venezuela for a rare CL-215 waterbomber.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A vital ferry link is down, so Buffalo mounts an all-out campaign to airlift 100,000lbs of essential goods across the Mackenzie River.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Crusty mechanic Chuck leads the scramble to ready the Electra for a disaster relief mission in Haiti, but fates curveball sends them to the High Arctic instead.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Young pilots AJ and Andrew get the chance of a lifetime to fly the magnificent DC-3 specially equipped with skis to land on frozen strips.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalo scores the charter of a lifetime when theyre asked to transport the Stanley Cup on a tour of the North.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Chief pilot Arnie lands the DC-3 on a homemade sand strip at a remote lodge; Electra expert Chuck faces off with a stubborn power unit; Rods wife Sasha goes into labor.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When thunderstorms and a shaking engine threaten a DC-3 charter to Whitehorse, Joe pulls out all the stops to get the passengers to their destination.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe hires Duane Hicks to help Buffalo navigate the future and coach Mikey; a DC-3 delivery mission goes awry when blizzard conditions and a broken oil cooler force an emergency landing.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalo gets into the stunt flying business when veteran pilot Arnie flies the DC-4 for the re- enactment scene of a famous WWII bombing raid.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Critical of the many stops and starts in the Electra program, and frustrated with the constant drama at Buffalo, Chuck quits.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Frustrated with her lack of flying and stuck in a rut as a courier driver, Audrey decides her time at Buffalo is over.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Duane lands a huge contract for the Electra and puts enormous pressure on mechanic Adam to prep the plane without the help of his mentor Chuck.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Electra flies to Alert, the northernmost settlement on Earth, forcing Adam and new senior manager Duane to work things out.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Sparks fly when Joe discovers Gord has taken a job with a rival airline after completing expensive training on one of the Buffalo planes.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Trying to make his mark at Buffalo, Duane lands two more Electra contracts.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine troubles on the C-46 during the valley run force Devan to shut down an engine.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine troubles on the C-46 during the valley run force Devan to shut down an engine.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie waterbomber pilot Scott gets his first taste of action when Buffalo responds to an emergency callout to fight fires in Alberta.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When Yellowknife and the northern aviation community are rocked by three crashes in the space of a month, Joe places an extra emphasis on safety.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Weighed down by the responsibility of training a new rampie, and struggling to get out of Joes doghouse, DC-3 co-pilot Tyler gets a once in a lifetime opportunity to stunt fly in his Cessna 150 for a visiting film crew.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After taking command of an intense airlift, and dealing with the ugliest Electra load hes ever seen, Scott takes a scary fall on the icy tarmac.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A week before Christmas, Buffalo agrees to lend a hand to an RCMP initiative to fly toys to isolated communities in the north.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Just months from retiring, Electra captain Ray Weber leads his crew on a multi-trip mission that requires landing on a rough ice strip on a remote lake.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When South Korean buyers come to Buffalo to look at a water bomber, the pressure is on mechanic Cory to get the plane ready.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: In South Korea, Cory and Justin meet the ship delivering Buffalos water bomber plane to new buyers there.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: As spring arrives and Rays retirement day approaches, Sean surprises everyone by leaving Buffalo for a job with the competition.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Greenlands Narsarsuaq airport - known as one the worlds most dangerous approaches - looms on the horizon as Cory and Justin begin a trans-global journey to deliver two CL-215 water bombers to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey hire a helicopter for a salvage mission to retrieve the rare tailpiece from a Lockheed 10-A that crashed in the Yellowknife woods forty years ago.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey links up with Chris Hadfield aboard the International Space Station. Problems mount while trying to get a frozen DC-4 airborne.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie co-pilot David faces a remote Arctic airstrip with sketchy landing gear. Mikey drafts a Buffalo hockey team to face off against an NHL squad in a charity shootout. Chuck gets a chance to shine on the ice.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe races a quirky antique snowmobile - with an airplane engine and no brakes. The water bomber crew struggles to get two planes out of Turkey. Cocky rampie Chris Staples tries to prove himself in the C-46.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A cold snap triggers massive challenges. Devan runs into gear problems while he ferries a mothballed DC-3 across the country. And Justin has to make a snap decision with his newborn son aboard his plane.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Facing Joes wrath, Rod and Cory head to the UK to make urgent water bomber repairs. David tries to prove himself to Devan in the C-46 but ends up infuriating Devan. Will makes an ultimatum in Hay River.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey trains for High Arctic survival with the Canadian Rangers. The Air Force invades Chucks hangar. Joe faces tough competition at a California plane auction.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: AJ and James battle a DC-4 engine fire. Its Joes 69th birthday - and hes never flown a helicopter before, so Mikey plans a special gift of chopper flight lessons.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Cory, Chuck and Brian watch as a 5,000-pound power unit smash to the ground, denting the Electra and putting it out of commission. Mikey scrambles to manage the crisis while Joe races to England to try and purchase a backup Electra.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey head to England to bring home a new plane. Devan does target-practice in the DC-4.James builds a Buffalo-style soapbox racer.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe flies with the Snowbirds during the Hamilton air show and later teaches Mikey to fly. A surprise departure shakes up Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Ice Pilots NWT celebrates a milestone with a look back at the last five years, a peek behind the camera and reflections from the Buffalo crew.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: An engine fire and series of mechanical gremlins has Buffalo scrambling to make its Christmas deliveries. Newest rampie Prefkar Mony struggles with life in the North.

programme.title: Three Kings Redemption
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 South Seas Spearo S2 - "Three Kings Redemption"
programme.desc: After a break of dawn beach launch off the tip of 90 Mile Beach, the team punch north to the legendary Three Kings Islands, home to dozens of record calibre fish, and in the process, bag a couple of new records for themselves.

programme.title: Gary, Indiana
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Epic Exploring S2 - "Gary, Indiana"
programme.desc: Josh is back in Gary, Indiana, for a local exploring adventure. With friends, he visits a former bank, the memorial auditorium and Union Train Station.

programme.title: Zagreb
programme.desc: Epic Exploring: Going Local visits Zagreb, Croatia. Cody fires a canon from the old tower, explores a never finished University Hospital and a political school.

programme.title: Copenhagen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Running the World S1 - "Copenhagen"
programme.desc: Max and Benj Cave travel to Copenhagen to meet up with a local free runner and undertake an epic run of Tivoli Gardens.

programme.title: London
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Running the World S1 - "London"
programme.desc: Max and Benj Cave travel to London where they are challenged to create a run in the Olympic Park.

programme.title: Newfoundland and Labrador, Canada
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Epic Trails S2 - "Newfoundland and Labrador, Canada"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson travels to the far eastern edge of North America to discover the beauty of Newfoundland and explore the stunning East Coast Trail.

programme.title: New South Wales, Australia
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Epic Trails S2 - "New South Wales, Australia"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson heads down under and puts his outdoor skills to the ultimate test as he challenges rugged mountain trails during spectacularly bad weather in New South Wales, Australia.

programme.title: The Gift of Shelter
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Kindness Diaries S2 - "The Gift of Shelter"
programme.desc: After diving into Costa Rica’s natural beauty, Leon sleeps on the beach. In Panama he meets some missionaries who introduce him to a deserving family.

programme.title: Creations of Prins Albert
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "Creations of Prins Albert"
programme.desc: Despite unforeseen travel complications, Xander travels through a picturesque mountain pass to Prince Albert to enjoy the olive farms and other specialties the town has to offer.

programme.title: The Ghosts of Matjiesfontein
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Ghosts of Matjiesfontein"
programme.desc: With one final trip ahead of them, Xander and his crew make their way from the scorching desert of Lindbergh to the haunted ghost town of Matjiesfontein.

programme.title: Los Angeles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Streets S1 - "Los Angeles"
programme.desc: Los Angeles based electronic music producer and DJ Moe Espinosa, aka Drumcell, has created sonic soundscapes which tell cinematic stories with his music. Moe has always tried to avoid commercialism and by having a vision that remains independent.

programme.title: Ho Chi Minh City
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Epic Exploring S2 - "Ho Chi Minh City"
programme.desc: Cody Buffinton steps into the streets of bustling Ho Chi Minh city in Vietnam in search of some hidden gems and urban exploring treasures.

programme.title: Tallinn
programme.desc: Josh Yozura goes off the beaten path in Tallinn for some local urban exploring in an old Soviet theatre and a prison hidden underneath the ice of a quarry lake.

programme.title: Marrakech
programme.desc: Cody is in Marrakech, Morocco, for a local exploring adventure on BMX-bikes through an old medina, along graffiti walls, night markets and a forbidden hotel.

programme.title: Great Barrier Island
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Piri’s Tiki Tour S3 - "Great Barrier Island"
programme.desc: Piri heads to Aotea on the Great Barrier Island with the Blackwell family. Join in as Piri dives for seafood and hunts for pigs!

programme.title: Ruapeke Island
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Piri’s Tiki Tour S3 - "Ruapeke Island"
programme.desc: Tangaroa and Rory take Piri hunting for deer, in search of shellfish in a lagoon and diving for Jurassic size seafood.

programme.title: Mawera
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Piri’s Tiki Tour S3 - "Mawera"
programme.desc: In the Eastern Bay of Plenty,Mawera, Karla and Steve take Piri hunting for peacock and I get schooled in the art of MMA in a cage fight with a master.

programme.title: Kuaotunu, Coromandel Peninsula
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Piri’s Tiki Tour S3 - "Kuaotunu, Coromandel Peninsula"
programme.desc: Champion spear fisherman, Julian, takes Piri spear fishing and into the bush chasing pigs.

programme.title: Ibiza
programme.desc: DJ-producer Carly Foxx travels to the clubbing capital of the world to inspire her music track and discovers Ibiza’s alternative spiritual side.

programme.title: Europe
programme.desc: DJ and house music producer Carly Foxx looks back at her journey to the music dance capitals of Europe to inspire her final track.

programme.title: Detroit
programme.desc: Punk rocker Jon-Mikal formed his band The Idiot Kids as a way to deal with his sexuality. After coming out to his family at 21, he uses writing and his stage performance as a form of therapy.

programme.title: New York
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Streets S1 - "New York"
programme.desc: Rapper Shiniqua, aka Pretty Little Monster, juggles motherhood while trying to avoid the trappings of Instagram fame. Her passion is writing rap lyrics and always tries to keep it real.

programme.title: French Polynesia Part 1
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Maximum Foodie S3 - "French Polynesia Part 1"
programme.desc: In this episode, Sashi is in a strip of islands in the middle of nowhere! French Polynesia! He scours the island of Bora Bora in search of a real local’s meal but goes empty handed. Switching gears, he looks for respite at the legendary Four Seasons Bora Bora where he embarks on a deep-sea fishing run with local fishermen, catching yellowtail tuna.

programme.title: French Polynesia Part 2
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Maximum Foodie S3 - "French Polynesia Part 2"
programme.desc: With luxury done and dusted, Sashi comes across a story of resurgence during a pandemic, with the story of St. James, one of the island’s newest restaurants. Feeling like he did Bora Bora justice, Sashi island hops over to Mo’orea where he takes the quirkiest food tour of his life; baguettes with chow mein, ice-cream pizza, Chinese dumplings!? The island of Mo’orea does quirky food right!

programme.title: Las Vegas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Streets S1 - "Las Vegas"
programme.desc: Las Vegas is home to a hot rod car club community which over the decades has been connected to the rise of rockabilly music. Through Luke Metz and his band, Shanda and The Howlers, we learn how this bond between fashion, music and cars was created.

programme.title: Oakland
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 A Simple Path S3 - "Oakland"
programme.desc: Yann celebrates Oaklands skateboarding cultures diversity. He visits Unity Skate Shop and Lower Grand Radio. He explores Town Park with K-Dub, meets Jai and the Skate Like a Girl crew. Then skates Marbies mini ramp, the hook and a dragon.

programme.title: LA County
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 A Simple Path S3 - "LA County"
programme.desc: Yann explores LA County skateboard communities, visiting Gunters handmade leather goods workshop, Open Gallery, Justins recycled skateboard wood shop, Tito from Local Hearts Foundation, and Eunice a vlogger, emphasizing community and creativity.

programme.title: Los Angeles
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 A Simple Path S3 - "Los Angeles"
programme.desc: Yann explores Los Angeles, visiting Kingswell Skate Shop, meeting DJ Chavez and Norman Woods. He encounters DiOrr Greenwoods artistic skateboards, Hali Stradas fashion and Chandler Burtons unique project merging drag, puppets and skating.

programme.title: Deep Sea Fishing
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Paradise De Praia S1 - "Deep Sea Fishing"
programme.desc: Imhambane is a prime fishing destination that will see the girls take to the reefs with local fishermen. Their task here is to fish for all the ingredients that will be required for a Portuguese inspired meal in the evening.

programme.title: Season Finale
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Paradise De Praia S1 - "Season Finale"
programme.desc: In celebration of the trip Andi and Chelsey, the girls invite the audience on a behind the scenes tour of the moments that made up their maritime adventure.

programme.title: End of the Season
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "End of the Season"
programme.desc: The best of the big wave surfing community wrap up an amazing El Nino season with the XXL Big Wave Awards in Anaheim, California.

programme.title: Las Vegas, USA
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Breaking Beyond S1 - "Las Vegas, USA"
programme.desc: Brazilian Bboy Neguin is visiting his friend Bboy Ronnie in his hometown Las Vegas. Ronnie istaking Neguin to meet all the different artists and dancers who are able to make a living inVegas by doing what they love most: performing on stage.

programme.title: Tokyo, Japan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Breaking Beyond S1 - "Tokyo, Japan"
programme.desc: Vegas Bboy Ronnie is traveling to Japan to visit Bboy Shigekix in his hometown Tokyo. Shigekix will take Ronnie on an exciting Journey to show the Japanese culture and its unique style of breaking and hip-hop.

programme.title: Rotterdam, The Netherlands
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Breaking Beyond S1 - "Rotterdam, The Netherlands"
programme.desc: In the city of Rotterdam, three times world champion, Menno, hosts b-boy Junior from France. Both are considered legends. Menno takes Junior on a trip he will never forget and meet people who have all left their mark in the Dutch breaking community.

programme.title: California Desert
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 My Van Life S1 - "California Desert"
programme.desc: Lisa connects with a nomad poet, who literally helps her ‘climb’ out of her funk by scaling a challenging peak. After taking tea with a magician, Lisa meets a paramedic single mother hoping to imbue her daughter with valuable life experiences.

programme.title: California Coast
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 My Van Life S1 - "California Coast"
programme.desc: After driving across the country, Lisa heads to Santa Monica to hang with a Hollywood producer and check out his pimped out Mercedes Benz G-Wagon. Lisa is welcomed into the school bus home of a family of 7! Because there is always room for one more.

programme.title: Cornwall
programme.desc: Marilia explores Cornwall, visits Bodmin Moor, meets a life coach and artist. She engages in nature activities, learns animal massage, forages seaweed, and relaxes at a spa. The episode captures Cornwalls landscapes and immersive experiences.

programme.title: St. Pete
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Journey Within S1 - "St. Pete"
programme.desc: Marilia spreads love on her Treasure Island journey, capturing hidden gems from tranquil beaches to transformative sound healing. Meeting artists, experiencing Dolphin Yoga, participating in a flamenco dance class, and sharing a tea ceremony.

programme.title: Joshua Tree
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Journey Within S1 - "Joshua Tree"
programme.desc: In Joshua Tree, Gabi shared astrology insights, Alchemy provided sound healing, and Marilia discovered spiritual connection. Guide Andrew introduced mindfulness, Doug showcased grounding through sprouting, concluding with reflection in hot springs.

programme.title: Introduction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Paradise De Praia S1 - "Introduction"
programme.desc: The journey begins. Andi and Chelsey introduce Mozambique from the luxury of a helicopter. In this episode the girls introduce two key conservationists who will re-join them later for epic ocean safaris. Welcome to Mozambique.

programme.title: Culture
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Paradise De Praia S1 - "Culture"
programme.desc: Having sailed and docked at Inhambane, the girls set their coordinates in the direction of Porcos Island where they will visit an isolated island tribe.

programme.title: Surfing
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Paradise De Praia S1 - "Surfing"
programme.desc: Tofu is a hotspot for surfers from around the world. Andi and Chelsey join up with pro surfer Davey van Zyl and learn to surf in one of Mozambique’s best breaks. In this episode the girls discover the importance of local surfing culture.

programme.title: Mikey Garcia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Back Home S1 - "Mikey Garcia"
programme.desc: Join world champion boxer Mikey Garcia as he travels back home to Mexico to get a closer glimpse at the country thats given birth to some of the greatest fighters in history.

programme.title: Alexis Blede
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Back Home S1 - "Alexis Blede"
programme.desc: Join actress Alexis Bledel on an emotional trip back to Buenos Aires, Argentina, her fathers birthplace.

programme.title: Banff and Lake Louise
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Epic Trails S1 - "Banff and Lake Louise"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson goes heli hiking and caving while exploring Canada’s first and most popular National Park and neighboring Lake Louise.

programme.title: Australia’s Northern Territory
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Epic Trails S1 - "Australia’s Northern Territory"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson heads down under to explore the Larapinta Trail and Kakadu National Park.

programme.title: Brazil…The Amazon
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Travel Quest S1 - "Brazil…The Amazon"
programme.desc: Seeing a jaguar in the wild is nearly impossible but working with one of the leading jaguar experts, Bill assists in a prey/predator study to get the best chance. In the process, he comes literally face to face with an 18 foot long Amazon Anaconda.

programme.title: Antarctica
programme.desc: Violent oceans, giant icebergs and incredible scenery are all in a day’s work in the Southern Continent. Bill shadows penguin researchers as they take population counts of one of the most fascinating birds on earth.

programme.title: Estonia / Vietnam
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Epic Exploring S1 - "Estonia / Vietnam"
programme.desc: In this episode, Josh travels to Tallinn in Estonia with urban explorer Steve Duncan where they explore Patarei Prison. Meanwhile, Cody is in Vietnam with his friend Sherman Mak and travels to Pan Thiet in search of abandoned amusement park Soui Cat.

programme.title: Los Angeles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Streets S1 - "Los Angeles"
programme.desc: Los Angeles based electronic music producer and DJ Moe Espinosa, aka Drumcell, has created sonic soundscapes which tell cinematic stories with his music. Moe has always tried to avoid commercialism and by having a vision that remains independent.

programme.title: North Carolina
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Van Life S1 - "North Carolina"
programme.desc: Meet Lisa, a former lawyer who escaped the rat race and moved into a campervan after the early death of her mother. Lisa embarks on a cross-country road trip, peeking inside homes on wheels, and connecting with the incredible community of nomads.

programme.title: Mississippi, Alabama and Arkansas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 My Van Life S1 - "Mississippi, Alabama and Arkansas"
programme.desc: A hurricane in the south forces Lisa to change direction. We meet southern Van Lifers living under the radar in a state where the lifestyle is judged harshly. Tragically, Lisa’s story takes a heavy turn when she discovers that her father has died.

programme.title: Texas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 My Van Life S1 - "Texas"
programme.desc: A colourful graffiti artist in Austin shares her story of loss with Lisa and gives her a tarot reading. We travel to rural Texas to overnight with Jupiter: an outspoken, non-binary person of colour, living in their vintage RV while studying law.

programme.title: Banff and Lake Louise
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Epic Trails S1 - "Banff and Lake Louise"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson goes heli hiking and caving while exploring Canada’s first and most popular National Park and neighboring Lake Louise.

programme.title: Australia’s Northern Territory
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Epic Trails S1 - "Australia’s Northern Territory"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson heads down under to explore the Larapinta Trail and Kakadu National Park.

programme.title: Brazil…The Amazon
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Travel Quest S1 - "Brazil…The Amazon"
programme.desc: Seeing a jaguar in the wild is nearly impossible but working with one of the leading jaguar experts, Bill assists in a prey/predator study to get the best chance. In the process, he comes literally face to face with an 18 foot long Amazon Anaconda.

programme.title: Antarctica
programme.desc: Violent oceans, giant icebergs and incredible scenery are all in a day’s work in the Southern Continent. Bill shadows penguin researchers as they take population counts of one of the most fascinating birds on earth.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Expedias Super Supper Club - Jordan S1 - "Part 1"
programme.desc: Join Chef Sara Aqel as she explores Jordan’s northern produce, landscapes, and historical sights before hosting an idyllic dinner at Amman’s Citadel.

programme.title: Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Expedias Super Supper Club - Jordan S1 - "Part 2"
programme.desc: Join Chef Ali Ghzawi as he takes us on a journey through Jordans southern sights of Petra, Aqaba, and Wadi Rum, using the best local produce, for a dinner at the Dead Sea.

programme.title: Episode 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Aerial Mountains: South Korea S1 - "Episode 1"
programme.desc: Gracefully formed by the earth’s tectonic forces and massive volcanic eruptions, the mountains are a fascinating natural phenomenon, and this aerial journey will seek to discover the spectacular mountains of South Korea.

programme.desc: Tiimi loytaa kauden parhaan jadelohkareen, mutta on vaarassa heikentaa sen arvoa, kun he yrittavat leikata kaikki halkeamat pois.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Uusi kaivoskausi on taynna ikavia yllatyksia, mutta epatodennakoinen tapahtuma pelastaa tilanteen.

programme.desc: Josh on kyllastynyt tyoskentelemaan isalleen, joten han perustaa oman kuorma-autoyrityksensa uudella rekalla.

programme.desc: Claudia, Robin ja miehisto yrittavat saada raskaan kaluston vuorelle ennen kuin tulvivat joet katkaisevat paasyn kaivosalueelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
