One man fights with his girlfriend in a bathroom, another fights with his girlfriend at home, both are surprised they are arrested for domestic violence. A habitual criminal is worried that other inmates will fight over him.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An angry inmate refuses to change clothes. A man in violation of his parole is stopped by officers for attempting to hitchhike. Two men claim they were beaten by their girlfriends.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated inmate escapes his restraints. A young woman denies she abused her mother, and a guard removes an inmate who is causing a disturbance.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A prostitute gets busted on a slow work day. An intoxicated inmate tangles with guards, and an angry woman has cross words for a guard.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman is brought into the detention center hogtied. A disruptive teen is sent to a holding cell. Casino valets tip the authorities about an intoxicated woman leaving behind the wheel.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Two sisters go on a mini-crime spree, get caught and find no one will bail them out. A domestic argument about night fishing lands a husband in jail for breaking into his own car. An irate inmate blows off steam by doing laps in her jail cell. A woman finds out it’s hard to stop selling drugs when the neighborhood knows her business.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 Las Vegas Motor Mouth
programme.desc: A belligerent man with a grudge is placed in a restraint chair. An intoxicated woman receives a love note from an inmate on worker status.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: To avoid self-harm, an intoxicated man is handcuffed to a booking bench. After fighting at a bar, a combative prisoner is arrested. Also, an unmarried couple squabbles during the booking process.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 Old Habits Die Hard
programme.desc: An inmate demands that officers follow her instructions while in jail. A man insists that he has been kidnapped by the police and is being held illegally. An elderly man discovers that domestic violence does not have an age limit. A young woman makes the hard decision to turn herself in to change her life around.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A jail chaplain counsels a sad inmate. An intoxicated woman demands to talk to the Canadian Embassy.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A night of karaoke results in a domestic-violence charge, and a drunk inmate starts a fight with his cellmate.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman tries to conceal illegal substances in her bra. Bandmates are charged for tresspassing, and two inmates are separated and placed in restraints after losing control.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV an intoxicated man is strapped to a restraining chair. In Portland, OR a seemingly gracious man is arrested for assault. In Spokane, WA a homeless man is brought in for assault. In Salt Lake City, UT a frequent visitor is brought in for threating the security staff at a local bar with a firearm.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An angry man refuses to cooperate during the booking process. A man claims to be part of the “international police”.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A vice unit interrogates several individuals accused of sex crimes. Suicidal threats provoke a high-stakes situation within cell walls. Unable to raise bail, a woman is incarcerated for several days.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: We follow the men and women of LVMPD as they do their best to tame the New Years Eve festivities up and down the Las Vegas Strip.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man under the influence states money will buy his freedom after threatening police with a gun. Individuals arrested for possession blame each other. A man arrested for drunk driving becomes unruly.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Prositutes discuss their risqu̩ occupation and explain their fees. An intoxicated woman doesnt want her blood drawn, and two shoplifters face the potential consequences of their actions.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Angry over her arrest, a woman becomes combative with officers. Busted once again for drugs, a smart young woman knows she is making dumb choices but can’t stop using. A man eluding the police swipes food from his workplace before landing in jail. Officers get a laugh from an arrested panhandler who wants to buy a permit for panhandling.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV a man who insists he paid for a speeding ticket becomes so incensed that he is placed in a restraining chair. In Sarasota, FL a belligerent man accuses officers of touching him inappropriately. In Portland, OR officers help a young mother and her kids.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Reno, NV a woman becomes violent with officers after having over indulged in boxed wine. In Salt Lake City, UT a drunk man is brought in for urinating in front of a family restaurant and in attempt to expedite his release he requests that the officers "git er done". In Reno, NV a former marine is taken in to custody for domestic abuse.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 Sunshine on a Cloudy Day
programme.desc: A woman who says she’s called “Sunshine” has less than a sunny disposition. A man ditches a halfway house for jail to get his life in order. A career criminal shows no regret for his “thug life.” Tense moments in Booking as officers and medical staff try to save a young man from a drug overdose.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Two men are found fighting on security cameras. Meanwhile, an impromptu tattoo jail parlor is discovered and shut down. Later, a Russian man and his mysterious friend are excited to be in a U.S. jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 One Too Many Times
programme.desc: A man learns it’s never a good idea to light up a joint next to an active crime scene. An officer encourages a young drug addicted couple to seek treatment. Luck runs out for a tutu-wearing prostitute, and officers pick up an at-risk kid for their 93rd time.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Texting, drinking and driving are not a good mix for a mother with her baby in the backseat of her car. After his arrest for shoplifting, a young man begins to realize the consequences of his lifestyle choices. A woman arrested on a warrant finds herself in solitary confinement after showing off her assets to another inmate. Officers try to convince a homeless young man that patching up his relationship with his family is better than being drunk on the streets.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated man claims to be connected to the occupy Wall Street movement. Officers struggle with a combative man, and a tearful candy thief is taken into custody.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Cousins come to jail together but only one leaves. Officers contend the best they can with an unruly inmate. Naked meditation in a parking lot lands a street artist in jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An uncooperative woman fights arrest resulting in a trip to the isolation chamber. One inmate calls 911 within jail walls causing confusion. Later, officers run to the rescue when a man passes out.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a combative inmate provokes the use of pepper spray. In Sarasota, FL a drunk woman is uncooperative during processing. In Spokane, WA a man attempts to flip off the camera while taking his mug-shot.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Reno, NV an intoxicated man is placed in isolation after exhibiting combative behavior. In Portland, OR a man wearing a red dress is brought in for trespassing and tells officers that he is in the FBI. In Reno, NV two young men are set straight after stealing a car.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers transfer an over caffeinated suspect to isolation so he can unwind. A man arrested for DUI while doing donuts in a mall parking lot asserts he was robbed. A jaywalking Utah man claims someone hit him on the head. A disgruntled detainee lands a sucker punch on a fellow inmate.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An uncooperative woman is placed in a restraint chair. A troubled woman with a drug addiction is brought in on prostitution charges. One man is taken to a sobering cell to sleep off his intoxication.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man is arrested at a popular theme park for public intoxication. A detainee swallows his earring during processing. Officers attempt to restrain a combative woman in custody.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: One man booked for intoxication is placed in a sobering cell for being uncooperative. An aggrieved woman claims Animal Control took her “baby.” A man tells officers he is a “child of God” and actor.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man arrested on drug warrants is upset about the BBQ brisket he left on the grill. An intoxicated ladies man flirts with the jail staff and an inmate finds it funny that he sold tree leaves as pot to an undercover officer. Brother turns on brother when a good deed gets mixed with alcohol. A man caught panhandling believes officers should arrest hardened criminals instead of him.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In San Diego, CA an officer grapples with a combative detainee. In Portland, OR six party goers are taken into custody. In Fort Worth, TX a high-risk inmate manages to get the key to his handcuffs.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman finds herself in jail after telling police she was frightened by a monkey mask. An intoxicate man feels an officer is very special. During a search, an officer finds contraband in a pack of cigarettes that has big consequences to an inmate. A young man says his mom tried to pepper spray him over his brother’s drug use while officers discover the truth to his arrest.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated man tests officers patience. A woman tries to deceive police with multiple identities. A one-legged biker shows off his balancing skills to officers.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT officers break up an altercation between two inmates. In Portland, OR a belligerent man questions the authorities. In Sarasota, FL a man is busted for DUI. In Las Vegas, NV a woman is taken into custody for battery.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A defiant suspect’s behavior takes a turn for the worse after being placed in the restraining chair. A spit mask wearing suspect attempts to procure enhancing supplements from a jail nurse. An intoxicated male suspect swoons for a certain female officer. A local vagrant is taken into custody after attempting to retrieve some things from his ex wife’s house.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Sarasota, FL officers place a hostile former Marine in isolation. In Portland, OR officers take a man into custody for joyriding in a stolen car. In Las Vegas, NV a jailed man is more concerned about the condition of his car rather than the people involved in the accident that was hospitalized.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A cologne salesman boasts and promotes his "magic potion". A man bloodies his neighbor in a one-sided feud. Taking an illegal drug has an unexpected consequence to one man’s face. Open Booking becomes a stage as one woman launches her singing career.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: By proclaiming that he is a Gulf War Veteran, a man states he should be imprisoned. A corporal investigates a “prisoner on prisoner assault.” An Officer’s last shift is filled with fireworks.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After totaling his Corvette, a man is arrested for drunk driving. Complex personality issues are unveiled while an inmate is interrogated. A man is placed in a mask after spraying saliva far and wide.

programme.title: Nurse Betty
programme.desc: Betty katsoo uskollisesti lempisaippuasarjaansa “Syy rakastaa". Tormattyaan kahteen ammattitappajaan katsoessaan yhta sarjan jaksoa Betty muuttuu “Nurse Bettyksi" ja lahtee etsimaan sydamensa valittua, tohtori David Ravellia. Betty hakee unelmiensa prinssia hurjalla retkella halki maan, mutta ehtiiko han loytaa miehen ennen kuin tappajat loytavat hanet?

programme.title: A Haunted House
programme.desc: Raavittoman hauska ja torkean naurattava kauhukomedia Paranormal Activityn tyyliin. Rakastunut nuoripari Malcom ja Keisha muuttavat unelmiensa taloon aloittaakseen yhteisen elamansa. Pian talossa alkaa tapahtua mystisia asioita ja selviaa, etteivat he olekaan kahden vaan Keishan on riivannut havyton demoni. Ahdistunut Malcom palkkaa manaajan ja lopulta nykypaivan Ghostbustersitkin ajamaan pois pahan hengen, joka terrorisoi hanen parisuhdettaan… ja ennen kaikkea seksielamaansa.

programme.title: The Female Brain
programme.desc: Mika saa naisen swaippaamaan oikeaan herra Vaaran ja vasempaan herra Oikean kohdalla? Sofia Vergara ja Whitney Cummings tahdittavat elokuvaa, joka kertoo ihan oikeasta tieteesta (usein kaduttavien) romanttisten impulssiemme takana. Suoraviivainen neurologi Julia tutkii miesten ja naisten aivojen eroja, jotka esitellaan kolmen eri suhteen vaiheessa olevan pariskunnan elaman kautta. Julian jamerat oletukset joutuvat kuitenkin koetukselle, kun tutkimuksiin osallistuu uusi nuori komistus...

programme.title: Uptown Girls
programme.desc: Brittany Murphy ja Dakota Fanning loistavat kirkkaammin kuin kaikki Manhattanin valot tassa ihastuttavassa New Yorkin satukertomuksessa. Molly (Murphy) on juhlivainen prinsessa, jonka rahat juuri loppuivat. Ray (Fanning) on nirso yhdeksanvuotias tytto, jonka viimeisin lastenhoitaja juuri lahti. Kun Rayn liian kiireinen aiti (Heather Locklear) palkkaa Mollyn uudeksi lastenhoitajaksi, se on taydellinen tilaisuus molemmille tytoille muuttaa tapojaan ja oppia, etta joskus paras ystavasi voi tulla odottamattomassa muodossa!

programme.title: The Stag
programme.desc: Moderni sulhanen suostuu vastentahtoisesti polttariviikonloppuun kaupunkilaisystaviensa kanssa. He lahtevat leireilemaan Lansi-Irlannin villiin luontoon. Porukan kauhuksi matkaan lyottaytyy morsiamen arvaamaton veli, johtajahahmo nimelta ”Kone”. Koneen rajahtava luonne ja hurjat johtamistavat vievat ryhman matkalle, jota he eivat unohda ikina.

programme.title: Joe - jokapaikan hoyla
programme.desc: Tim Allenin esittama Joe on mies, jonka elama on muuttunut vakaasti aina vain surkeammaksi. Kun toimiston kiusaaja menee liian pitkalle, Joe paattaa vihdoin muuttua mitattomyydesta joksikin paremmaksi.

programme.title: Hamekytta 2
programme.desc: Hamekytan villissa jatko-osassa Martin Lawrence ja Nia Long palaavatviihdyttamaan koko perhetta. Kansakunnan turvallisuus on uhattuna ja FBI-agenttiMalcolm Turner in on jalleen kerran...

programme.title: Kuuhullut (Moonstruck)
programme.desc: Tassa klassisessa romanttisessa komediassa Brooklynin leski (Cher) on valmis menemaan uudelleen naimisiin. Talla kertaa han aikoo tehda sen oikein, vaikka joutuisikin sanomaan ”kylla” miehelle, jota han ei oikeasti rakasta. Mutta kun han rakastuu sulhasensa veljeen (Nicolas Cage), seuraa romanttinen mutka, joka on arvoinen suurimpia koomisia oopperoita! Olympia Dukakis on myos mukana.

programme.title: Middle School: The Worst Years Of My Life
programme.desc: Rafe Khatchadorianilla on vaikeasti lausuttava sukunimi, valtavan vilkas mielikuvitus... ja ongelmia auktoriteettien kanssa. Rafe ei ole mikaan vallankumouksellinen anarkisti, mutta han on kuitenkin aloittamassa koulunkayntia jo jarjestyksessa kolmannella ylaasteellaan. Rafen toita paiskiva yksinhuoltajaaiti toivoo, etta tama koulu lopultakin sopisi hanen pojalleen. Mutta Hills Villagen ylaasteella yksilonvapautta ei kunnioiteta, vaan voimassa ovat epaoikeudenmukaiset kayttaytymissaannot. Rehtori-Dwight ei jata huomioimatta yhtakaan rikkomusta, koska han haluaa pysya ykkosena alueen koulujen suoritustilastoissa.

programme.title: The Birdcage - Lainahoyhenissa
programme.desc: Tassa hysteerisessa komediassa Armand ja Albert ovat rakentaneet taydellisen elaman hoitaessaan Miami-yokerhoaan. Mutta heidan pastellinsa rauha jarkkyy, kun Armandin poika ilmoittaa menevansa naimisiin ultra-konservatiivisen senaattori Keeleyn tyttaren kanssa... ja he kaikki kokoontuvat illalliselle! Pystyvatko Armand ja Albert muuttumaan Herra ja Rouva Perhearvoiksi ajoissa?

programme.title: Shriek If You Know What I Did Last Friday the 13th
programme.desc: Toimittaja tutkii murhasarjaa, joka tunnetaan nimella Spring break massacre ja se vie sekasorron viela pidemmalle tassa slasher-elokuvien parodiassa.

programme.title: Come to Daddy
programme.desc: Kun Norval saa odottamatta kirjeen vieraantuneelta isaltaan, han matkustaa isan syrjaiselle rantatalolle. Mutta hyvin pian han huomaa omituisen tunnelman, ja kaivatusta jalleentapaamisesta muodostuu helvetillinen painajainen.

programme.title: Wheres The Money
programme.desc: South Los Angelesista kotoisin oleva nuori ja terava Del saa tietaa, etta hanen vankilassa istuva isansa ja juuri telkien takaa vapautunut setansa ovat varastaneet miljoona dollaria, jotka ovat katkettyina eraan vanhan rakennuksen kellarissa. On vain yksi pieni ongelma: arvostettu yliopisto on levittaytynyt naapurustoon, ja vanha yomaja on askettain keskiluokkaistunut valkoisten opiskelijoiden veljeskuntatalo.

programme.title: Kostaja haudan takaa
programme.desc: Jimmylla on pakkomielle saada yhteys kuolleeseen aitiinsa mustan magian kautta ja han on pelottavan lahella onnistua. Mutta kun hanen uusi ystavansa Amir yrittaa saada hanet tekemaan vaikutuksen koulun kuumimpiin tyttoihin yksinkertaisella rituaalilla, jatkat vapauttavat pahan voiman, joka voi herattaa kuolleet ja tehda aidista zombien.

programme.title: Adult Life Skills
programme.desc: Anna on jumissa. Han on melkein 30, mutta asuu aitinsa puutarhavajassa, ei juttele juuri kenenkaan kanssa ja viettaa aikansa tekemalla lyhytelokuvia, joissa nayttelevat hanen peukalonsa. Jotakin puuttuu, ja eristyneisyys nayttaa olevan Annan tapa kasitella suurta surua. Mutta kun Anna sattumalta ystavystyy kahdeksanvuotiaan cowboyn kanssa, han alkaa pikkuhiljaa avautua. Adult Life Skills on Rachel Tunnardin ensimmainen pitka elokuva, joka kertoo yhta lailla surullisen kuin hauskankin tarinan kuolemasta ja sen kanssa elamisesta. Broadchurch-tahti Jodie Whittaker tulkitsee sulkeutuneen Annaan roolin kauniisti ja humoristisesti.

programme.title: Middle School: The Worst Years Of My Life
programme.desc: Rafe Khatchadorianilla on vaikeasti lausuttava sukunimi, valtavan vilkas mielikuvitus... ja ongelmia auktoriteettien kanssa. Rafe ei ole mikaan vallankumouksellinen anarkisti, mutta han on kuitenkin aloittamassa koulunkayntia jo jarjestyksessa kolmannella ylaasteellaan. Rafen toita paiskiva yksinhuoltajaaiti toivoo, etta tama koulu lopultakin sopisi hanen pojalleen. Mutta Hills Villagen ylaasteella yksilonvapautta ei kunnioiteta, vaan voimassa ovat epaoikeudenmukaiset kayttaytymissaannot. Rehtori-Dwight ei jata huomioimatta yhtakaan rikkomusta, koska han haluaa pysya ykkosena alueen koulujen suoritustilastoissa.

programme.title: Peace, Love and Misunderstanding
programme.desc: Komedia menestyksekkaasta newyorkilaisesta asianajajasta (Catherine Keener), joka tuo mukanaan kaksi vilkasta teini-ikaista lastaan hippiaitinsa (Jane Fonda) luo maalle perhelomalle. Rentouttava viikonloppu muuttuu kuitenkin pian seikkailun, romantiikan, musiikin, perhesalaisuuk sien ja itsensa loytamisen kesaksi.

programme.title: Break Point
programme.desc: Veljekset Jimmy ja Darren ovat vieraantuneet toisistaan. Darren on rahapulassa ja Jimmy haluaa tehda paluun tennismaailman huipulle. Siispa he paattavat lyottaytya yhteen, perustaa uudelleen nuoruutensa nelinpeliparin ja pyrkia Grand Slam -turnaukseen karsintojen kautta. Kumpikaan ei ole entisessa vedossaan, mutta erikoisten ystaviensa ja rohkaisevan, vaikkakin kyynisen isansa avulla nama nahjusmaiset sankarit saattavat oppia voittamaan parhaimmatkin vastustajansa. Rooleissa muun muassa koomikot Jeremy Sisto, Adam Devine ja Oscar®-palkittu J.K. Simmons.

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Katastrofielokuvassa seurataan joukkoa naurettavan kuvankauniita nuoria, jotka joutuvat yhden illan aikana lahes jokaisen mahdollisen luonnonkatastrofin riepottelemaksi. Asteroidit, pyorremyrskyt ja maanjaristykset saapuvat tuhoamaan kaupunkia ja vaikeuttavat nuorten yritysta keskeyttaa valtoimenaan riehuvaa havitysta. Hyokkayksen kohteeksi joutuvat mm. Indiana Jones, Iron Man, Amy Winehouse, High School Musical ja monet muut suositut elokuvat, pop-ikonit ja julkkikset.

programme.title: Warm Bodies
programme.desc: Rakkaus voittaa kaiken. Jopa vastustamattoman pakon syoda kumppaninsa aivokudosta! Lahitulevaisuudessa maapallolla asuu yhta paljon ihmisia syovia zombeja kuin myos zombeja vastaan taistelevia ihmisia. Hetken mielijohteesta nuori zombi R pelastaa toisten zombien hyokkaykselta Julien, jonka suonissa veri virtaa kovaa. Heidan ystavyytensa uhkaa sen hetkista maailmanjarjestysta! Julien pitaa vain pysya hengissa ja R:n pitaa pysya kuolleena tarpeeksi kauan.

programme.title: What We Did On Our Holiday
programme.desc: Doug (David Tennant) ja Abi (Rosamund Pike) ovat aivan normaalit vanhemmat, joilla on kolme hurmaavaa, mutta omalaatuista lasta. Kun vanhemmuuden raskaus uhkaa niin avioliittoa kuin mielenterveyttakin, he paattavat vieda lapset Skotlantiin. Dougin eksentrinen isa Gordie (Billy Connolly) nimittain tayttaa 75. Sovinnon ja anteeksiannon viikonloppu muuttuu pian ratkiriemukkaaksi sosiaaliseksi miinakentaksi, kun vanhat kaunat, vaarinymmarrykset ja runnellut egot vaativat saada puheenvuoron.

programme.title: The Stag
programme.desc: Moderni sulhanen suostuu vastentahtoisesti polttariviikonloppuun kaupunkilaisystaviensa kanssa. He lahtevat leireilemaan Lansi-Irlannin villiin luontoon. Porukan kauhuksi matkaan lyottaytyy morsiamen arvaamaton veli, johtajahahmo nimelta ”Kone”. Koneen rajahtava luonne ja hurjat johtamistavat vievat ryhman matkalle, jota he eivat unohda ikina.

programme.title: Off the Rails
programme.desc: Kolme viisikymppista naista haluaa toistaa nuoruutensa Interrail-seikkailut Euroopassa sen jalkeen kun heidan laheinen ystavansa kuolee ja jattaa heille junaliput seka viimeisen toivomuksen: heidan pitaa ottaa naisen tytar mukaan. Talla kertaa matkustelu ympari Eurooppaa osoittautuu vaikeaksi heille, kun kadonneet passit, junalakot ja odottamattomat romanttiset suhteet sekoittavat heidan ystavyyssuhteensa. Kysymys kuuluukin: ehtivatko he ajoissa kunnioittamaan ystavansa muistoa?

programme.title: Adult Life Skills
programme.desc: Anna on jumissa. Han on melkein 30, mutta asuu aitinsa puutarhavajassa, ei juttele juuri kenenkaan kanssa ja viettaa aikansa tekemalla lyhytelokuvia, joissa nayttelevat hanen peukalonsa. Jotakin puuttuu, ja eristyneisyys nayttaa olevan Annan tapa kasitella suurta surua. Mutta kun Anna sattumalta ystavystyy kahdeksanvuotiaan cowboyn kanssa, han alkaa pikkuhiljaa avautua. Adult Life Skills on Rachel Tunnardin ensimmainen pitka elokuva, joka kertoo yhta lailla surullisen kuin hauskankin tarinan kuolemasta ja sen kanssa elamisesta. Broadchurch-tahti Jodie Whittaker tulkitsee sulkeutuneen Annaan roolin kauniisti ja humoristisesti.

programme.title: Thanks for Sharing
programme.desc: Paallepain ymparistokonsultti Adamilla, yksityisyrittaja Mikella ja ensiapulaakari Neililla ei ole mitaan yhteista, mutta he kaikki ovat mukana 12 askeleen ohjelmassa kohti vapautta riippuvuuksistaan. Adam ei uskalla heittaytya uuteen rakkauteen, Mike yrittaa raivokkaasti kontrolloida perhettaan eika Danny suostu myontamaan ongelmiaan, mutta haasteet ja pienet askeleet yhdistaa miehet perheeksi, joka kannustaa, raivostuttaa ja kiittaa toisiaan matkalla uuteen elamaan.

programme.title: Nimeni on Trinity - paholaisen oikea kasi
programme.desc: Villia lantta ilman tarkempaa paamaaraa kiertava Trinity paatyy polyiseen pikkukaupunkiin, jossa hanta odottaa todellinen yllatys. Hanen lainsuojaton velipuolensa Bambino on kaupungin sheriffi! Tosin Bambino on ottanut pestin vastaan vain, koska on jalleen lakia paossa ja tarvitsee valehenkilollisyytta piiloutuakseen... Kaupungin mahtavimmalla miehella, majuri Harrimanilla on saalimattomia suunnitelmia valtansa ja maa-alueittensa kasvattamiseksi, mutta laheisessa laaksossa asuva mormoniyhdyskunta on suunnitelmien tiella. Harriman miehineen aikoo vaikka vakipakolla ajaa mormonit alueelta... Mutta yhdyskunnan kanssa ystavystynyt Trinity sotkee mielellaan Harrimanin kuviot.

programme.title: 7 Days to Vegas
programme.desc: Tositapahtumiin perustuva tarina Hollywoodin isokenkaisista, jotka lyovat vetoa mista vain. Duke on parhaat paivansa nahnyt entinen nayttelija, joka asuu yha Los Angelesissa ja jarjestaa laittomia pokeripeleja erikoisille tyypeille. Eraana paivana peliin liittyy ohjaaja Sebastian, josta tulee pian porukan paras pelaaja. Han on tyypillinen Hollywoodin mantti elokuvaohjaaja, joka tuntee rikasta ja pelihaluista vakea. Duke tekee yhteistyota Sebastianin kanssa ansaitakseen yha enemman rahaa. Sitten alkaakin vedonlyonti siita, voiko mies kavella Las Vegasiin viikossa.

programme.title: Shriek If You Know What I Did Last Friday the 13th
programme.desc: Toimittaja tutkii murhasarjaa, joka tunnetaan nimella Spring break massacre ja se vie sekasorron viela pidemmalle tassa slasher-elokuvien parodiassa.

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: The Birdcage - Lainahoyhenissa
programme.desc: Tassa hysteerisessa komediassa Armand ja Albert ovat rakentaneet taydellisen elaman hoitaessaan Miami-yokerhoaan. Mutta heidan pastellinsa rauha jarkkyy, kun Armandin poika ilmoittaa menevansa naimisiin ultra-konservatiivisen senaattori Keeleyn tyttaren kanssa... ja he kaikki kokoontuvat illalliselle! Pystyvatko Armand ja Albert muuttumaan Herra ja Rouva Perhearvoiksi ajoissa?

programme.title: American Empire
programme.desc: This epic of Americas westward march stars Leo Carrillo and Preston Foster in a tale of men building a cattle empire, only to battle rustlers, the weather, and each other! The romantic adventure from director William C. McGann (In Old California, Alcatraz Island) features a strong leading performance by Oscar nominated RKO star Richard Dix (Cimarron, The Ghost Ship) plus cinematography by six-time Oscar nominee Russell Harlan (To Kill a Mockingbird, Rio Bravo).

programme.title: The Kansan
programme.desc: Richard Dix stars in this epic of the boisterous and brawling Old West! Wounded in a gun battle with the notorious James gang, John Bonniwell (Dix) wakes up in the hospital to find out hes been elected marshal! He quickly learns that this hot-headed frontier town can only be cooled off with blazing lead and dynamite! Jane Wyatt, Albert Dekker, Victor Jory, and Robert Armstrong also star in this tale of smashing fists and crashing bullets from director George Archainbaud (The Lost Squadron).

programme.title: Between Men
programme.desc: When his young son is shot, John Wellington kills the culprit and flees. But his son Johnny recovers and is raised by Sir George. Some twenty years later Johnny sets out to find Sir Georges missing granddaughter. He finds her and also finds Rand, but neither of the two men realize they are father and son.

programme.title: Born to Battle
programme.desc: Cyclone Tom Saunders starts a ruckus in a Chinese laundry and has to go before a judge. Unable to pay his fine, he is bailed out by a local cattle rancher and agrees to do 30 days work for him. Its not too long before he becomes enmeshed in a war between rustlers and outlaws.

programme.title: Brothers of the West
programme.desc: Tom Tyler plays Tom Wade, a range detective whose brother has been accused of robbery and murder. Wade has only one clue to prove his brothers innocence: a set of unusual tire tracks. This film was directed by Sam Katzman, who later became known as Jungle Sam for his association with a variety of jungle thrillers, and then as a master of all exploitation genres, from teen horror to flying saucer flicks!

programme.title: Brand of the Devil
programme.desc: The Texas Rangers tangle with a band of dangerous rustlers in this two-fisted production from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Starring Dave OBrien, Kermit Maynard, and Guy Wilkerson, with direction by low-budget ace Harry L. Fraser.

programme.title: Hellgate (Edited Version)
programme.desc: In 1867 Kansas, veterinarian Sterling Hayden treats an injured stranger who turns out to have been a guerrilla raider--and Hayden soon finds himself serving a term in one of the worlds most terrifying prisons under sadistic commandant Ward Bond. Adapted from the story of Dr. Mudd, the physician who attended John Wilkes Booth, assassin of President Lincoln.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are ordered to San Pablo, Mexico, to find out whats behind the trouble an American tungsten mine is having. When they arrive, they discover the mine has been closed, the wells are all poisoned and the town is in the grip of a malaria epidemic. To make matters worse, the lawmen have been followed by four gunslingers determined to give the American troubleshooters all the trouble they can handle - and more. Russell Hayden stars.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In this episode, Pat and Stoney tangle with a gang of robbers who have hijacked an Army payroll. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan. Originally aired on NBC.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Kates Recipe for Hot Rhubarb
programme.desc: Kate tries to teach Betty Jo how to make hot rhubarb after setting her up on a double date. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired November 12, 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Bank robbers stay the night at Shady Rest hoping to intercept a bank shipment on the Cannonball.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Sherman Marks. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho are falsely accused of robbing a stagecoach. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Two bandits impersonate Cisco and Pancho, sending the two to prison for robbery and murder. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951. It was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Frank and Jesse James
programme.desc: Detective Matt Clark tracks down the James Brothers who seek revenge on the law following the death of their half-brother.This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955.. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954. Also, look for legendary tough guy actor lee Van Cleef as Jesse James.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Railroad detective Matt Clark is challenged by a band of freight-car robbers led by Apache chief Geronimo. This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955.. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle, plus Chief Yowlachie and Emile Meyer. Directed by William Witney.Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White. Episode first aired in 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 Judge Declares a Holiday
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, the judge meets up with a con man who comes to towns, arranges horse races then skips town with the receipts and all the money that was bet. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, an outlaw gang plans to take over the town by getting Judge Bean to resign over false charges of misconduct. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Annie and the Twisted Trails
programme.desc: Feeling envious about Annies freedom and trick riding skills, Della runs away from home to see her boyfriend when the rodeo comes to town. While on her own, she meets a couple that secretly wants to rob her father.Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Also starring Carolyn Craig, Ewing Mitchell, and Myron Healey. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Tensions rise as a range war over water seems inevitable. A masked man dressed as Robin Hood tries to help the homesteaders by knocking down the ranchers fences. Things seem to be going well until a similarly dressed imposter robs the Diablo bank.Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was niominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook are turned away from a town due to the Black Plague.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: A young man seeks vengeance against the Shawnee for the murder of his parents. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben Cartwright unknowingly hires outlaw Johnny Logan to help him with his cattle drive. Logan, going by the name Sam Jackson, joined with a plan to kill the sheriff of a nearby town.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Sunset Carson Rides Again
programme.desc: Sunset Carson is trying to raise money for a new school and his partner Sam Webster is out to stop him. When Carson plans a benefit prize-fight, Webster plans to make off with the proceeds. Direted by Oliver Drake; starring Sunset Carson, Al Terry, Pat Starling, Ron Ormond, Joe Hiser.

programme.title: My Pal Trigger
programme.desc: Roy Rogers goes to jail after hes wrongly accused of killing Gabby Hayes horse in this action packed yarn from Republic Pictures. All of the old jokes about cowboys kissing their horse may have started with this very movie, as it focuses on Roys loving relationship with Trigger, the greatest horse in all of Hollywood. The film also features Roys beloved Dale Evans, plus, adding some country swing to the musical numbers is Roys favorite backing band, the Sons of the Pioneers! Songs include Ole Faithful, Long, Long Ago and Livin Western Style.

programme.title: Jesse James Rides Again
programme.desc: The outlaw Jesse James and his friend are on the run from the law when he is wrongly accused of leading the historic 1876 Northfield, Minnesota bank robbery. With nerve-tensing turns and high-impact action, Jesse rides into a town where a gang is trying to drive area ranchers off their land because theres oil underneath it. Jesse James takes particular interest in the situation of a pretty young woman and her elderly father, whose ranch is being regularly attacked by the gang.

programme.title: West of the Divide
programme.desc: John Wayne stars as Ted Hayden, a tough hombre who goes undercover to join a gang led by a heartless fiend known only as Mr. Gentry (Lloyd Whitlock). Gentry is out to take over a ranch belonging to one of Haydens friends, but as Hayden finds out, Gentry has a lot more than that up his sleeve. Youll have to watch this two-fisted Western to find out the rest!

programme.title: One-Eyed Jacks
programme.desc: Dad Longworth robs a Mexican bank, takes the loot, and leaves his partner Rio to be captured. However, Rio escapes capture and searches for Dad in California.

programme.title: Ghost Town Gold [The Three Mesquiteers]
programme.desc: CAVALIERS OF THE CACTUS COUNTRY--ALWAYS READY FOR A FIGHT OR A FROLICK! The second entry in what would grow into a wildly popular series of Western Three Mesquiteers B-Movies produced by Republic Pictures, Ghost Town Gold tracks the titular trio as they attempt to recover the gold stolen by a gang in its effort to ruin the bank/mayor who ordered them to leave town. Frequent John Wayne collaborator Joseph Kane adds his signature directorial panache to this rousing shoot-em-up, setting the tone for a film series that was so rampantly successful, it spawned 50 sequels and a host of imitators from rival studios.

programme.title: Fighting Fury
programme.desc: A THRILLING TALE OF REVENGE AND REDEMPTION! Based on the story Triple Cross for Danger by the widely lauded Western author Walter J. Coburn, Fighting Fury is a thrilling take on the Western revenge drama. Portraying both a father and his son, star of silent and sound cowboy adventure films, Jack Hoxie (Trouble Busters, Law and Lawless) exudes the classic American rustic charm that still defines the genre. The film spins the yarn of Clay Hill Jr. (Hoxie), a Spanish-American boy raised by a Mexican servant who vows bloody vengeance on three malicious ranchers after they murder his parents and turn his life upside down. Featuring fine supporting performances from genre heavies Helen Holmes,...

programme.title: Red Ryder: Ride, Ryder, Ride!
programme.desc: Red Ryder encounters bandits trying to hold up the stagecoach carrying the owner of the Devils Hole newspaper, Libby Brooks and her brother Gerry. Red successfully drives off the attackers but becomes embroiled in further conflict, leading to a duel that nearly claims his life.

programme.title: With Sitting Bull at the Spirit Lake Massacre
programme.desc: A long-thought-lost film finally surfaces after being unseen for over eight decades. Created and copyrighted by Sunset Productions in 1925 but not released until June 15, 1927, this silent epic features the superior Native American actor Chief Yowlachie (performing here under the name Chief Yowlache) as Sitting Bull. Other fine actors in the cast include the always popular Bryant Washburn and a young Bob Steele, who appears under his real name Bob Bradbury Jr. The story takes place in the 1860s or 1870s near Spirit Lake, Iowa. Settlements of whites are growing in that region but the Sioux Indians also have professed their interest in one such settlement. Chief Sitting Bull surveys the...

programme.title: The Two Gun Man
programme.desc: Ken Maynard stars in this vintage western about ranchers under threat from hired gunmen. Director Phil Rosen, whose career dated back to working with Thomas Edison and included several Charlie Chan features, keeps the action hot with help from a strong ensemble, including Charles King, Murdock MacQuarrie, and a horse named Tarzan! Maynard plays Blackie Weed, a marshall going undercover to capture and arrest some cattle rustlers.He finds himself up against some very bad men, and hes soon framed for murder. Watch as Blackie blazes his way to vindication with a .45 in either hand and the flame of righteous anger in his eyes... Kitty: Nita Martin. Joe Kearney: Lafe McKee. Lem Tolliver: Tom...

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: In an episode called Koniakers, G-Men Pat Gallagher and Stoney Crockett investigate how U.S. currency in a bank vault was replaced by counterfeit money. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West. In this episode, Pat and Stoney get reports that a man is selling salted mines to investors. The two G-men are determined to discover the truth. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe is pelted with eggs after his team, the Hooterville Hornets, lose a game. Worse, Bedloe is back in town, which is never a good sign. It turns out Bedloe is planning a suroprise inspection with help frmo the railroad. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Kate hires Herby to work as an assistant manager at the hotel, causing Uncle Joe to fear for his position. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho must prove their innocence when they are accused of killing the assistant to the sheriff in Bonanza.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 .This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco tries to help a beautiful woman prove that her brother is innocent after hes arrested for murder.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode first aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Quantrill and His Raiders
programme.desc: Jim Davis stars as Matt Clark, a railroad detective tasked with the mission to infiltrate the Quantrill gang before the Lawrence Kansas massacre.This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955.. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Plus, Bruce Bennet stars as Quantrill, with Steve Darrell as Bloody Bill Anderson.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detectives Matt and Frankie investigate a woman named Cattle Kate who seems to be the source of cattle ranches suffering major losses in Sweetwater, Wyoming.This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955.. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Cattle Kate: Jean Parker. Episode first aired in 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: In this epsiode, Storts and Hurley are holding hostage a doll that brings good luck to a Mexican village. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, a couple of con men attempt to snare Letty into their scheme and spirit her away to San Francisco. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: A member of Teddy Roosevelts Roughriders returns to Diablo to take the valuable land he had been promised. When he arrives, he discovers that the land is part of an Indian reservation. Things quickly turn from bad to worse when a corrupt land agent frames the man for murdering a brave with the hope of inciting an Indian war, which he will use for his own desires for the valuable land. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Diablo is in danger when a gang of hired killers comes to town. Lofty finds himself conflicted as he is reluctant to take on the gang once he discovers the leader rescued him back in their days in the U.S. Cavalry. With the state senator possibly the target of the gang, the townspeople call for Lofty to resign amid his reluctance. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primtetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook go up against two thieves with stolen identities. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook suspect that a young mans uncle is behind the recent attacks against him. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper.Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After Adam gets hurt while saving a woman from a group of indians, the woman must nurse Adam back to health as the rest of the tribe sets out to find her.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Texas Brooklyn and Heaven
programme.desc: When Eddie Tayloe (Guy Madison, 5 Against the House) receives $6,000 from his grandfather, he decides to leave his drab newspaper job and move to New York. His dream is to have a play produced on Broadway. Along the way he picks up a pretty hitchhiker (Diana Lynn, The Miracle of Morgans Creek) who is also leaving her own dreary life for a shot at New York. Unfortunately, they find that the Big Apple is a hard place to make a living. But its also a city where circumstances keep bringing them together!

programme.title: Colorado Sundown
programme.desc: Murder among ranchers is the subject of this Republic Pictures drama. Starring such names as Rex Allen, Slim Pickins, and Chester Clute, this feature was directed by William Whitney. For Trivia Buffs: At one time Whitney was known as the youngest director in Hollywood, having been hired by the newly formed Republic Pictures at the tender age of 21.

programme.title: Captain Apache (Edited Version)
programme.desc: After Harry T. Collier, a beloved commissioner of Indian Affairs, is murdered in late March during the1880s, Captain Apache, an Indian graduate of West Point, is assigned by the army to investigate the crime. Suspecting that O.J., the sheriff of a town bordering the reservation may be involved in the killing, Apache travels there and finds the sheriff dining with his mistress Maude at the Paradise Saloon. Before Apache can question him, however, O.J. abruptly departs and rides out of town with Apache in pursuit. When Apache apprehends him, O.J. swears that he did not kill Collier and relates that the agents dying words were April Morning. Meanwhile, Griffin, a wealthy landowner and six of...

programme.title: Under California Stars
programme.desc: Disaster strikes when Roy Rogerss beloved horse Trigger is stolen and held for ransom money. Will Roy find $100,000 to get his faithful companion back, or will he find a way to trap the gang holding the horse hostage? Along with Roy and Trigger, youll find Andy Devine as Cookie Bullfincher, and young Michael Chapin as Ted Carver, a gallant boy who helps reunite Roy with the smartest horse in show business!

programme.title: The Star Packer
programme.desc: He Dared Death In The Outlaws Lair! John Travers (John Wayne) takes on a mysterious gang leader known as The Shadow in this vintage western from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Director/writer Robert N. Bradbury (Blue Steel, Riders of Destiny) gets the best of a remarkable cast that includes George Gabby Hayes. Of interest to film buffs is that the feature was shot in various California locations by Oscar winning cinematographer Archie Stout (The Quiet Man).

programme.title: Courageous Avenger
programme.desc: Gold, gangs, and the heroic fight for life! Johnny Mack Brown (Billy the Kid, Coquette) stars in this western thriller about murders going on in a mining community. Its a story full of twists, where the greed for gold is only surpassed by the struggle for life!

programme.title: Daughter of the West
programme.desc: A FLAMING PAGE FROM AMERICAN HISTORY Becomes a powerful motion picture...set against the panoramic grandeur of the West!. Martha Vickers stars as Lolita Moreno, a convent raised woman in the 1880s who learns about her Native American heritage through her relationship with an educated Navajo. Morena had been raised at a California mission, but when she leaves to teach school in Arizona, the threads of her mysterious past are revealed. This leads to her involvement with some dangerous people, and a chance to find love in the most unexpected way. The cast includes Phillip Reed, Donald Woods, William Farnum and Milton Kibbee. Pedro de Cordobaa stars as Chief Wykomas.

programme.title: No Parking
programme.desc: Mr Bean cant find a parking space. So he makes one of his own.

programme.title: All You Can Eat

programme.title: Bean Shopping
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is locked in a department store overnight having the time of his life.

programme.title: The Big Stink
programme.desc: Mr Bean ends up in a farm slurry pit after racing a tractor.

programme.title: In The Wild
programme.desc: Mr. Bean decides to become a wildlife photographer.

programme.title: Eau De Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wicket’s new, expensive perfume on the floor.

programme.title: Homeless
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to let a room but no one will let him.

programme.desc: Mr. Bean fancies a game of golf.

programme.title: Inventor

programme.title: The Cruise

programme.title: Dinner For Two
programme.desc: When invited to dinner by Mr Bean, it’s probably best to take your own sandwiches.

programme.title: Running On Empty

programme.title: The Bottle
programme.desc: Mr Bean loses his bottle.

programme.title: A Royal Makeover
programme.desc: Mr Bean redecorates his room, making it fit for a Queen.

programme.title: Stick It

programme.title: Bean Encore

programme.title: Car Wash

programme.title: The Mole
programme.desc: Mr Bean loses control of a pest and makes a mountain out of a molehill.

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: An escaped prisoner suffers hard labour under Mrs Wicket while Mr Bean puts his feet up in jail.

programme.title: Chocks Away
programme.desc: Mr Bean’s hobby goes down in flames in his battle for air supremacy.

programme.title: Beans Bounty
programme.desc: Whilst digging for buried treasure, Mr Bean digs himself a hole too deep to get out of.

programme.title: Game Over
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wicket’s nephew.

programme.title: For Sale

programme.title: The Fly
programme.desc: Bean fights a loosing battle with a winged beast from Hell.

programme.title: Toothache

programme.title: The Newspaper
programme.desc: Every time Bean goes to collect the newspaper from the letterbox, it disappears.

programme.title: Spa Day

programme.title: No Parking
programme.desc: Mr Bean cant find a parking space. So he makes one of his own.

programme.title: Holiday For Teddy
programme.desc: Mr. Bean takes Teddy on holiday to the seaside.

programme.title: The Past Never Dies
programme.desc: CASEY MARSH was born in captivity. Her mother, JANE, was abducted as a teenager and gave birth to Casey while she was being held by the kidnapper, TIMOTHY FAST. Jane eventually escaped when Casey was 6 years old. Timothy Fast was arrested and incarcerated. Ever since, Jane has struggled to regain a normal life for her and her daughter. For Casey, the memories of a childhood in captivity still haunt her. Jane, on the other hand, has seemingly moved on. She has re-married and is happy. When a number of local women start to go missing, Jane reveals to Casey that Timothy might have had an accomplice and wonders if he is involved. The kidnapping M.O. is eerily similar. Casey is furious that...

programme.title: Number 1 Pastor
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Eze was not called by God, but by money when he realizes how much money pastors are making. He decides to venture into the ministry, guising as a pastor, and develops a plan to get money. He plants listening devices in the houses of his church members and pretending to prophesy what he listens in on. His ministry grows big but he soon catches the attention of Shalewa , a young investigative journalist who is desperate for her big break and she decides to do a piece on him.

programme.title: The Housekeepers Daughter
programme.desc: A housekeeper and her boss decide to play matchmaker between her daughter and his son but plans go awry as an unforeseen chain of events and perhaps a sprinkling of fate bring about totally unexpected results.

programme.title: Benefit Boys
programme.desc: When a group of school boys suddenly start showing off material things on campus, they raise suspicion about where their sudden wealth has come from.

programme.title: Broken Glass
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. When lke is released from prison after being convicted for a crime he didnt commit, he finds out that all his properties are gone, his wife is now married to his best friend, and a daughter that barely recognises him. Determined to get his life back, he starts a lowly job that leads him to a young woman, who feels sorry for him and decides to help him get all he has lost.

programme.title: Lisas Code
programme.desc: Lisa is a successful young lady in her own rights, but a victim of domestic abuse. She does not believe in the concept of love and marriage and has resolved to remain single for the rest of her life. Pascal believes he can change Lisa’s mind and challenges her to a game of love, but who will win when not all cards are on the table?

programme.title: Rich Guy Poor Guy
programme.desc: Ella is torn between loyalty to a man she loves and her love for the money of another.

programme.title: Naomi
programme.desc: Naomi, a young woman from humble beginnings, takes a job as a housemaid, not realising how broken the home she will be working in is.

programme.title: Dice
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Denrele Bada is a popular actor in Nollywood, known for his method acting. One strange night, Bada kills his girlfriend of 4 months and he strangely confess to it. Yomi Taiwo is the state prosecutor determined to nail Bada for the chair. While investigating the case, Yomi discovers that Bada usually takes his characters home but this time, Badas latest character was a murderer sent to kill his girlfriend. What must Yomi do?

programme.title: AMC Movie Talk S6 - Editi Effiong
programme.desc: Join us every week on the AMC couch as we talk to the biggest movers and shakers in the buzzing industry. We are putting you in the know with all things in African and Nollywood cinema actors, actresses, directors, producers, classic cinema and soon to be blockbuster hits its all here on AMC Movie Talk.

programme.title: AMC Movie Talk S6 - Dara Simi
programme.desc: Brand new season with A list Nollywood celebrities! Join us every week on the AMC couch as we talk to the biggest movers and shakers in the buzzing industry. We are putting you in the know with all things in African and Nollywood cinema actors, actresses, directors, producers, classic cinema and soon to be blockbuster hits its all here on AMC Movie Talk.

programme.title: A Dead Mans Tale
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A “responsible” married man was supposedly killed by his side chick in a hotel room while having fun. The late man’s children are determined to get justice for their father’s death, but their mother is bent on letting the suspected murderer go scott-free.

programme.title: Blatant Denial
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A vehicle inspection goes wrong with Inspector Farouk and deputy Akpan. They escape the long arm of the law, but karma finds a way to get justice.

programme.title: Hunt
programme.desc: The CEO of a trucking company is acquitted during a high profile human trafficking case but when he wants to go legitimate, his shady business partner is determined to do everything in his power to keep their arrangement going.

programme.title: MTV Shuga Down South S3 Ep 1
programme.desc: MTV Shuga Down South kicks off with Thuli living unhappily with her aunt in KwaZulu-Natal. After an attempted rape incident, Thuli decides to take control of her own life.

programme.title: MTV Shuga Down South S3 Ep 2
programme.desc: The new season of MTV Shuga Down South kicks off with Thuli living unhappily with her aunt in KwaZulu-Natal. After an attempted rape incident, Thuli decides to take control of her own life.

programme.title: Reform
programme.desc: Two detectives are forced to team up with a sinister criminal to save the daughter of an important man. Can they put their differences aside for the mission?

programme.title: Eva
programme.desc: Eva finds herself in the middle of family drama when she is taken in by a handsome man, not realising the complicated relationship he has with his wealthy father and his father’s cunning and jealous new wife.

programme.title: Intoxication
programme.desc: A hardworking husband and his materialistic wife are at odds with each other when his main means of income is compromised. She does all she can to continue keeping up appearances in public but their relationship is falling apart behind the scenes.

programme.title: Rekindle
programme.desc: Kofi meets Iris, a beautiful woman during her vacation to Ghana and becomes infatuated with her, but she leaves him without leaving any information as to where she can be reached. When he goes to Nigeria to visit, he is surprised to be greeted by a familiar face claiming to be his cousin, Frank’s fiance.

programme.title: MTV Shuga Down South S3 Ep 3
programme.desc: The new season of MTV Shuga Down South kicks off with Thuli living unhappily with her aunt in KwaZulu-Natal. After an attempted rape incident, Thuli decides to take control of her own life

programme.title: MTV Shuga Down South S3 Ep 4
programme.desc: The new season of MTV Shuga Down South kicks off with Thuli living unhappily with her aunt in KwaZulu-Natal. After an attempted rape incident, Thuli decides to take control of her own life

programme.title: The House Keeper
programme.desc: Adamma leaves her village and moves to the city with her aunt, Patricia. She soon finds out that city life is not all its cracked up to be, when Patricia and her friends try to recruit Adamma into their line of work.

programme.title: Boss and I
programme.desc: A habitual womanizer finds love in his new employee, but his reputation threatens the stability of this relationship and his desired happiness.

programme.title: Swivel
programme.desc: The marriage of Deji and Ebere is in serious jeopardy when they start working for the same organisation. They find it difficult to balance their marriage and their careers and things are made worse when Ebere starts to outshine Deji in the workplace.

programme.title: Free Man
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Efe has been living his life the way he wants it, sowing his wild oats with every woman he meets until the mothers of his children decide to hold a meeting to discuss his business. His baby mamas bring his children over for a vacation with their father, ruining his chance at a good weekend with his new catch.

programme.title: AMC Music Lounge S6 - Taves
programme.desc: AMC brings you legendary and undiscovered artists as they discuss all things music and beyond. Stay tuned for intimate interviews and live music performances.

programme.title: AMC Music Lounge S6 - Coblaze
programme.desc: AMC brings you legendary and undiscovered artists as they discuss all things music and beyond. Stay tuned for intimate interviews and live music performances.

programme.title: Unseen Date
programme.desc: A young lady spends all her time on her phone talking to a man she met online, much to the annoyance of her family. Things come to a head when they finally meet but wires are crossed and it looks like the potential couple would not get their happily-ever-after.

programme.title: The Awaken
programme.desc: An aspiring musician who hasnt had much luck or support catches a break when he perfomrs at the birthday party of an older woman. Things get complicated when it is discovered that she is his ex-girlfriends mother.

programme.title: AMC Red Carpet - Snow White
programme.desc: AMC Red Carpet brings you exclusive red carpet interviews with Nollywood stars at the premieres of top Nollywood movies and other industry events such as award ceremonies.

programme.title: Rich Guy Poor Guy
programme.desc: Ella is torn between loyalty to a man she loves and her love for the money of another.

programme.title: Naomi
programme.desc: Naomi, a young woman from humble beginnings, takes a job as a housemaid, not realising how broken the home she will be working in is.

programme.desc: Non-stop 70s rock and power ballads - all day!

programme.title: 70s Rock Anthems Day!

programme.title: Roskos Hellraisers! Top 25
programme.desc: The biggest rock n roll rebels of the 1970s, presented by the man who was there â that groovy host from the west coast â Radio 1 legend Rosko!

programme.title: Retro Rewind! 70s Edition
programme.desc: From hippies to punk rockers, via folk, funk, soul and disco - these are the classic songs that made the 70s!

programme.title: Gone...But Not Forgotten Top 25
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Gone...But Not Forgotten Top 25
programme.desc: These 25 stars of rock and pop during the 70s are no longer with us. But the music from names like McVie, Bowie, Bolan, Marley, Mercury, Lennon and Presley will live on forever.

programme.title: Bruno Brookes UK Top 40 of the 70s
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bruno Brookes UK Top 40 of the 70s

programme.title: Monday Night at the Movies!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Monday Night at the Movies!
programme.desc: Popcorn at the ready, these are NOW 80s biggest songs from the movies. But dont forget to switch off those mobile phones!

programme.title: Mark Goodiers US No.1s of 1981
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Mark Goodiers US No.1s of 1981
programme.desc: 60 minutes of back to back US chart toppers from 1981 - none of which made the top spot in the UK! Including Rick Springfield, Eddie Rabbit, Starsound and Dolly Parton.

programme.title: Every Number 2 of the 80s!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Every Number 2 of the 80s!
programme.desc: Can you believe none of these 145 songs reached number 1? Mark Goodier with 12 hours of classics - in order - that didnt quite have what it takes, but still sound fantastic!

programme.title: Orchestral Manoeuvres! 1979-1991
programme.desc: An hour from the kings of 80s synth - Orchestral Manoeuvres in the Dark.

programme.title: Nutty Boys! Madness 80-86
programme.desc: 14 quickfire songs from the Nutty Boys of Camden Town - Madness! Including Baggy Trousers, Michael Caine and Wings of a Dove.

programme.title: The NOW Yearbook 1980
programme.desc: 1980 was another top year in music, with pop and new wave rubbing shoulders with rock, reggae, synth and even a love song or 2! Bruno Brookes has the story - month by month.

programme.title: Brunos Forgotten Hits 1980-1989
programme.desc: 120 videos, In order, a forgotten hit from each and every month of the 80s. Radio 1 legend Bruno Brookes is the man with the 10 hour musical plan!

programme.title: Hits That Missed!
programme.desc: Lesser known songs you may have forgotten from artists youll certainly know!

programme.title: Jenny Powell: Such A Good Feeling!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Jenny Powell: Such A Good Feeling!
programme.desc: Dancing through history - one anthem at a time! From late 80s optimism to mid 90s euphoria, its where house, rave and eurodance all started. Hands in the air people!

programme.title: Brunos Forgotten Hits 1980-1989
programme.desc: 120 videos, In order, a forgotten hit from each and every month of the 80s. Radio 1 legend Bruno Brookes is the man with the 10 hour musical plan!

programme.title: Showtunes! 1982-1989
programme.desc: 60 minutes of classics from a golden age of musical theatre - the 1980s. Featuring Cats, Phantom, Chess, Dreamgirls and Aspects of Love, plus lesser known musicals Mutiny and Time.

programme.title: Ant Raps! Adam Ant 1980-1990
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Ant Raps! Adam Ant 1980-1990
programme.desc: All the big hits from Adam and his Ants from the first half of the 1980s, plus his comeback single from February 1990 - "Room At The Top" - as a bonus!

programme.title: Hits That Missed!
programme.desc: Lesser known songs you may have forgotten from artists youll certainly know!

programme.title: Jenny Powell: Around The World!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Jenny Powell: Around The World!
programme.desc: From Londons West End to the the Manhattan Skyline, via Belfast, Rio, Vienna, Bangkok, Japan, China and Egypt - this is Captain Jennys wander around the world... in song titles!

programme.title: Endless Love! All Day
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Endless Love! All Day
programme.desc: All day long - classic 80s love songs from the NOW Thats What I Call Music archive. Timeless anthems of passion and heartbreak.

programme.title: NOW 100 Hits: Love Songs!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 NOW 100 Hits: Love Songs!
programme.desc: Simon Bates with the ultimate countdown of 80s love. Yes - 100 songs with heartfelt vocals, lush strings and big breakdowns in a 9 hour marathon! Expect Whitney, Lionel and George.

programme.title: Endless Love! All Day
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Endless Love! All Day
programme.desc: All day long - classic 80s love songs from the NOW Thats What I Call Music archive. Timeless anthems of passion and heartbreak.

programme.title: Clare Grogans Teenage Kicks!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Clare Grogans Teenage Kicks!
programme.desc: The 5 years from 77 to 81 was possibly the most exciting and vibrant time to be a teenager and Clare Grogan was there - buying the records, seeing the bands and wearing the t-shirts!

programme.title: Duncan James Eurovision Top 25
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Duncan James Eurovision Top 25
programme.desc: His band Blue represented the UK in 2011 - coming 11th! But there have been far bigger winners and losers over 50 years as we go Eurovision crazy with 2 hours of highs - and lows!

programme.title: Mellow Moments!
programme.desc: Kick back and relax with some mellow moments. Chilled to perfection.

programme.title: Who Had The Most Weeks in Top 75?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Who Had The Most Weeks in Top 75?
programme.desc: Who spent the most weeks in the UK Top 75 during the 90s? We countdown the Top 100 artists with longevity - all their song weeks combined and surprises are a guarantee!

programme.title: Lisa Stansfields 90s Ladies
programme.desc: The UKs First Lady of soul selects her 20 favourite girls of the 90s. Expect Gabrielle, kd Lang, Annie Lennox and Lauryn Hill.

programme.title: 1990 Unleashed!
programme.desc: The standout chart music that defined the decade - from Britpop, Boybands and RandB to the birth of electronic dance beats!

programme.title: Feelgood 40: The Girls!
programme.desc: 40 ladies loaded with feelgood factor! From megastars like Gaga, Katy Perry and Shakira to Missy, Kylie and Girls Aloud.

programme.title: The NOW 100 Of The 00s
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The NOW 100 Of The 00s
programme.desc: Mark Goodier with a definitive countdown of the 100 biggest acts of the 00s - compiled using record sales, concert tickets, awards and more - from the UK, the USA and around the world!

programme.title: 2006 Unleashed!
programme.desc: The standout chart music that defined the decade - from indie rock, singer-songwriters and girl bands to dance, RandB and the early emergence of UK garage and grime.

programme.title: Pat Sharps 30 Silly Songs!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Pat Sharps 30 Silly Songs!
programme.desc: The decade where we did the Bartman, took a Trip to Trumpton and had Sex on the Beach! The 90s were full of nonsense and Pat Sharp was the silliest of them all!

programme.title: Mellow Moments!
programme.desc: Kick back and relax with some mellow moments. Chilled to perfection.

programme.title: The NOW 100 Of The 00s
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The NOW 100 Of The 00s
programme.desc: Mark Goodier with a definitive countdown of the 100 biggest acts of the 00s - compiled using record sales, concert tickets, awards and more - from the UK, the USA and around the world!

programme.title: Mark Goodiers No.2s of 1992
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Mark Goodiers No.2s of 1992
programme.desc: 60 minutes of back to back runners up from 1992 - from The KLF to Kris Kross to Mariah Carey! Helping to Heal The World is Mr Charts himself - Mark Goodier.

programme.title: The 1992 Video Hall of Fame
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The 1992 Video Hall of Fame
programme.desc: Radio 1 and Top of the Pops legend Gary Davies with the iconic images and award winning clips that set the style of 1992. Including Annie Lennox, Def Leppard, REM and Shakespears Sister

programme.title: 1992s Forgotten Hits!
programme.desc: Month by month Bruno Brookes plays 12 lesser known hits of 1992! Including ZZ Top and Marc Almond plus forgotten acts like Opus III and Martika.

programme.title: Mark Goodiers No.1s of 1992
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Mark Goodiers No.1s of 1992
programme.desc: 60 minutes of back to back number 1s from 1992 - with Deeply Dippy and Sleeping Satellite, plus the Erasure boys dressed as the Abba girls! With Mr Charts himself - Mark Goodier.

programme.title: 1992s Biggest Love Songs
programme.desc: All about love, all Top 20 hits and all released in 1992! From Whitney to Mariah, Roy Orbison to Take That - how many do you remember and which song do you love most?

programme.title: All Day - Its 1992!
programme.desc: All day long we are back in 1992! From chart-toppers to forgotten favourites, movie soundtracks to the headlines that made the year!

programme.title: Simon Bates New Golden Hour: 1992
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates New Golden Hour: 1992
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits and headlines from the year we said hello to Gladiators, Heartbeat and The Big Breakfast on the TV and WH Smiths said goodbye to vinyl records in their stores!

programme.title: Who Won Wot in 1992?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Who Won Wot in 1992?
programme.desc: Mark Goodier with 1992s big award winners. Youll find out that years Least Fanciable Male and Worst Original Song! Plus the biggest selling albums and singles.

programme.desc: Former Kiss FM DJ Robin Banks presents the 20 biggest party tunes of 1992 - a year of Felix, Utah Saints, SL2 and U2!

programme.title: Backtrack: Soft Rock 2015-1980
programme.desc: In reverse: Starting in 2015, were going back 35 years with timeless, soft rock tracks and big power ballads!

programme.title: Blazing Rock Ballads!
programme.desc: The Biggest Ballads from the royals of rock! From Queen, Bon Jovi and Whitesnake to Meat Loaf, Nickleback and Evanescence.

programme.title: 100 Rock Ballads with Simon Bates
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 100 Rock Ballads with Simon Bates
programme.desc: 9 hours of love, heartbreak, loss and personal struggle. Who better than Mr Our Tune Simon Bates with another rock marathon spanning 5 decades.

programme.title: Soft Metal Monday
programme.desc: Kicking off your week with the finest in Soft Metal! From Aerosmith, Bon Jovi and Foreigner to Bonnie Tyler, Heart and Meatloaf.

programme.title: Turn Up The 00s Soft Rock
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Turn Up The 00s Soft Rock
programme.desc: Turn up your speakers to 11 for 30 of the finest soft rock tracks from the noughties! Starting in 2000, featuring tracks from Keane, Nickleback Snow Patrol and Evanescence

programme.title: Robin Banks 80s Antiques Rockshow
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Robin Banks 80s Antiques Rockshow
programme.desc: Crammed full with extraordinary finds, hidden treasures, and plenty of old relics! From the Stones and Genesis, to KISS and INXS - how many of these family heirlooms do you own?

programme.title: Rated Rock! The No.1s
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Rated Rock! The No.1s
programme.desc: Number 1 rock songs from the last 50 years! With mega hits from the Arctic Monkeys and KOL right back to legends like The Stones and T.Rex!

programme.title: 80s v 90s Rock Legends!
programme.desc: 30 hit songs, 15 top rock legends - one track as they were in the 80s, and another in the 90s - simple!

programme.title: Monsters of Rock! 2000-2009
programme.desc: A definitive 6 hour marathon of 00s rock anthems in order! From Alien Ant Farm to The Arctic Monkeys, Fall Out Boy to The Foo Fighters, Weezer to the White Stripes.

programme.title: The 1975: Fan Favourites
programme.desc: From 2013 to 2022 - 40 minutes of the biggest rock songs from The 1975!
